iaspar stone sardyne stone raynebowe seate syght lyke emeralde seate foure twentye seates vpon seates foure twenty elder syttyng clothed whyte rayment heades crownes golde doth iohn looke see spirite prophetes dyd beholde fygure whiche representeth vnto thee heauenly mystery kyngdome christ thinges happen afterwarde iohn dyd see heauen beyng opened spirite asmuche rapte ofto spirite god seate precious stone raynebowe spirite god heauely traunce aboue al man witte power capacyte god stoole seate heauen sygnified euerlastynge state continuaunce power myght blisse ryghtuousnes god bryghtnes precious stone sygnified hyghe maiestye glory god bewtyfyed knowledge al thinges raynebowe sygnifyeth mercye pacient sufferynge yet without mete condigne reuengeauncethe xxiiii seates xxiiii elder iustice xxiiii seates xxiiii elder doe sygnifye hyghest iustyce vnsearcheable councell iudgement god speciall frendes god bothe olde new testament incorporate kyngdome god bothe patryarkes kynges prophetes apostle bysshops subiect vnto lorde holynes ready honour eternally al doe knowledge receyued goodnes commendacion haue bountyfull grace god texte seate proceded lyghtnynges thondrynges voyces vii lampes fyre burnynge seate whiche vii spirites god seate sea glasse lyke vnto cristall myddes seate rounde aboute seate foure beastes full eye behynde first beaste lyke lyon seconde beaste lyke calfe thirde beaste face man fourthe beaste lyke flying egle iiii beastes echone syre wynges full eye within rest daye nether nyght sayinge holy holy holy lord god almightye come earnest iudgement commaundement god shall opened made manyfest vnto worlde thorowe gospell whiche shall fearful heauy vnto wycked ioyfull welcome vnto faithfull godly vnto shall come gyftes plentifull spirite godthe sea glasse whiche shall appeare fruites sea glasse maye sygnifye vnto v aduersityes lyfe whiche serue glorye god also syngular profyte faithfull frutefull exercyse faythe thethe foure sondry beastes face man calfe iiii sondry beastes interpreted olde doctours sygnifye iiii euangelystes maye betoken iiii special mystery christen faythe manhode christ maye sygnified face man passion death christ calfe appoynted slayne offered resurrection death lyon ascencion heauen egle whiche misteries christ plentuously setthe lyon egle furth holy gospelles christ kyngdome descrybed vnto world necessarye perfyght doctrine wynges whichthe wynges spoken doe sygnifye lyke doe vi chapter esaye obedience reuerence whiche creature doe owe duty vnto lorde whiche vertues faythful willyngly dylygently doe declare withall redynes swyftnes godly deuout heartes multitude eye dothe sygnifye christen doctrine wysedome god wherof nothe eye want scarsenes churche doctrine must learned taken holy scripture geuen god whiche cause al godly blessed myndes well angel men shal neuer cease prayse exalt almightye god holy al workes onely one godly substance yet trinite person wonderfully declared expressed bothe al holy scripture also heauenly wysedome prophetes holy men secretely inspired lyghtned god eue certein heathe also whiche thorowe true fayth doe knowledge confesse one onely god creatour thinges ruler gouernoure foreuer immutable texte p beastes gaue glorye honour thankes sate seate whiche lyueth euer euer foure twentye elder fel downe sate trone worshypped lyueth euer cast crownes trone sayinge thou arte worthye lorde god receaue glorye honour power thou hast created thinges thy wylles sake created one creature geueth euermore occasion another knowe honour al meanes possyble vnsearcheable highe maiesty power wysoome mercy onely creatour maker al world knowledgyng al goodnes founde sene maner creature come onely god whiche well sprynge goodnes cause onely honored inuocated feared reuerence submission muche euer possible al creature performe haue haue soeuer lyfe power actiuite altogether god ascribe nothing good vnto selues v chapter texte p sawe right hande sate trone boke wryten within backe syde sealed seuen seales sawe stronge aungell whiche preached loude voyce worthy open boke lose seales therof man heauen erth nether vnder erth able open boke nether loke theron wepte muche man founde worthy open reade boke nether loke theron one elder sayd vnto wepe beholde lyon trybe iuda rote dauid hath optayned open boke loce seuen seales therof boke hande god holy scripture doctrine god inspired holy goost written thorowe prophetes sealed vp vnknowen vnto men whiche wyll enterpryse reade interprete naturall reason capacyte owne suttyll wittes onely whether spirituall sence letter cause fewe cyuyll polytique learned men geuen altogether vnto worldly wysedom dyd euer lytle medle booke beare minde vnto therfore ezechiel daniel commaunded set locke vpon notwithstandynge booke truth necessarye profytable al electe child god beleue man alone none el open booke tymes whiche hath spirite christ neyther dyd euer open begynnynge lyke christ alwayes present patriarkes prophetes al suche thinges concerned honour rulynge instructyng faythful churche thorow faythe euen spirite god present electe plentyfullye directe al matter concerning necessitie saluacion althoughe secretly manyfestly wherfore truly booke shut vp vnto worldly natural reason onely vnto heathen also vnto fleshely iewes stony harte part vnto suche without spirite christe doe enterpryse medle wrytinges holy scripture therfore iohn bewayleth ignoraunce blyndnes iewyshe people without cause yet comforte hath wyll amende better suche tyme spirite christe thorowe merytes death passion christ shall take awaye blyndnes maner errours bothe heathen iewes thorowe spirite god apostle shall opened mystery holy gospel hidden tholde testament onely vnto good iewes also vnto heathen whersoeuer dwel world hath iesus christ sauiour world deserued brought passe wt lyonyshe might shep symplicitie mekenes pacience wyllyng passion eue according prophetes dyd tell signifie long specially iacob blessing ouer trybe iuda cause christ called lion tribe iuda also named esay prophetes dauids stocke mathew declareth genealogie birth christ onely sonne abraham iacob also sonne dauid texte p behelde lo myddes seate foure beastes myddes elder stode lambe thoughe bene kylled hauynge seuen horne seue eye seuen spirites god sent al world came e boke right hande sate vpon seate taken boke foure beastes xxiiii elder fell downe lambe hauyng euery one harpes golden vyalles full odoures prayer sainctes songe newe longe saying thou art worthy take boke open seales thereof thou wast killed hast redemed v thy bloude al kinredes tonges people nacions hast made v vnto oure god kynges priestes shall raygne earthe declaracion wordes maye foloweth wel euidetly vnderstande euen foure euangelistes haue described christ lambe woryed slayne ful giftes holy goost accordynge vnto nomber seue principal article christen faith cocerning christ namely manhode passion buriall resurreccio ascensio sendynge holy goost comynge latter daye iudge whole worlde whiche article spred brode knowe vnto whole world receyued thorowe gospel preaching apostle thus desyre al holy patriarkes prophetes fulfilled whiche desyred nothinge hartely tha manifestacion honour god true knowledge loue religion true onely one god whiche thing come passe thorow spreadyng abrode gospel thus swete smellyng oblacio thanckes geuynge institute begon al world maner old stynekyng ydolatry abolyshed thorowe christe holy apostle true honour religion god spred abrode preserued synne al world cleane wyped away thorow bloude christ offered vpo crosse error supersticion al people false seruice god vtterly suppressed rightuousnes true faith restored kingdome christ set forwarde thorowe infynite mercye grace god whiche beareth rule child kyngdome christ electe lyfe kyngdome heauen kyngdome heue taketh begynnyng world cogregacion faythful shal dayly increase thorow word god vntyl made perfyght euerlastynge kyngdome god electe heauen texte p behelde hearde voyce many angel throne beastes elder hearde thousande thousandes sayinge loude voyce worthy lambe kylled receyue power ryches wysdom strength honour glorye blessing al creature heauen earth vnder earth see hearde saying blessyng honour glorye power vnto sytteth vpon seate vnto lambe euer ore foure beastes sayd amen xxiiii elder fell vpon face worshypped lyueth euermore meanyng iohn place gospell proue faythe godheade christ heretyckes cause ascrybeth vnto christ place many dyuine name property apperteynyng onely godheade first shal inuocate prayed vnto onely patryarkes prophetes also al angel creature doth excel worthynes onely euerlastyng true onely one god thus setteth furthe godly worthines meeke crucified christ lambe slayne offered vp vnto humblenes eue vnto crosse suche name geue aboue name therfore knee creature heaue earth hel shal bowe vnto vnto perteyneth power saye omnipotency myghtines ryches spiritual treasure distrybute accordynge vnto wil wysdome whiche lyke equall omnisciece ful knowledge al thinges father strength ouer aboue al might power wyde world honour prayse laud excedyng mercy goodnes infynite benefites vnto whome vnto creatour al creature made subiect onely vnto sitteth vpo stoole also vnto lambe whiche christe true god vnto father holy gost apperteyneth al laud honour euer euer whiche onely one god whiche thing shall also ascrybed geuen vnto hym vnyforme full assent holy electe bothe heauen earth p vi chaptre texte p saw lambe opened one seales hearde one iiii beastes say noyse thonder come see saw beholde white horse sat bowe crowne geuen vnto went forthe conqueryng ouercome opened seconde seale hearde seconde beaste say come se went another horse redde power geue sat theron take peace earth shoulde kyll one another geuen vnto great swearde seuen special article misteries christen faith maye opened eue lyke vii seales thorow holy goost holy scripture olde newe testamet excellent clerke erasmus doth proue diuerse testimony paraphrase vpon xxiiii chapter luke yet maye vnderstande openynge seales maner first white horse may vnderstade first state christe churche altogether pure without blemyshe faut holy well armed ready prepared yea also swyfte horse vnto al godlines tyme kyngdome christ floryshe increase whole world sytteth vpo horse hathe crowne vpo kyngdome heaue wt bowe euangelycal doctrine wherwith hath conquered ouercome blessedly error ydolatry slayne wt glorious triumphe victorye seconde seale vnderstade state kyngdome christ tyme martirs fro time steue vntil tyme costantyne emperour whan churche paynted bloode thorow hole world thorow tyrannye romyshe emperour wt standynge tyme also iewes suffred extreme calamity great plage death vnder reygne tytus vespasyan adriane maye sygnified deade horse great sworde romyshe emperours cotinually slaye one besydes diuerse peryshed otherwise also may wel vnderstade sitteth vpo red horse texte p opened thirde seale hearde thirde beaste say come se behelde lo blacke horse sate payre balance hande heard voyce myddes foure beastes say measure wheate peny thre measure barly peny oyle wyne se thou hurte thirde seale beast blacke horse thou mayest vnderstande great dearth happened vnto christian heathen iewes romaine suche tyme eyther claudius traianus reygned emperours althoughe prouidence god alwaye prouyde sufficiet noryshement appeareth euydently reade cronycles tyme balance maye betoken penury want vytels muche compelled wey measure much euery one haue dayly parte lyue measure wheate vnderstande porcion allowed one man dayes spending texte p opened fourth seale hearde voyce fourth beaste saye come se looked beholde pale horse name sate death ell folowed power geuen vnto ouer fourthe parte earth kyl swearde honger death commeth vermen earth fourthe seale beast voyce pale horse mayst thou vnderstande heretykes whiche dyd dyuerse wayes longe tyme vexe holy churche false doctrine haue made pale bleaked sorow heuynes myschiefe hath preuayled many landes whole christendom tyme great euer dyuerse godly byshops christian persecuted death place true faythes sake tree p whe opened fyfte seale sawe vnder aulter soules kylled word god testimonye whiche cryed loude voyce saying long tariest thou lorde holy true iudge auenge bloude dwel earth long whyte garmentes geue vnto euery one sayd vnto rest yet lytle season vntyl nomber felowes brother kylled fulfylled fyfte seale aulter soules vnder maye sygnifye ryght godly christen men whiche syghe crye might one see true honour god shyne floryshe al rightuousnes increase procede true fayth true vnderstandynge word god againe crye also tyrannous gouernour wycked magistrate vnto geuen comforte conscience stedfast trust cofidence promyses god deceyue yf crye earnestly feruetly token redempcio great comforte hande meane tyme doe obteyne saluacio soules immediately death ioyes heauen wheras doe wyllyngly paciently wayte resurreccion bodyes suche tyme nomber felowes shalbe accomplisshed fulfylled whiche tyme nomber onely knowen vnto lorde texte p beheld whe opened syxt seale lo great earth quake sunne blacke sacke clothe made heare mone wexed euen bloude starres heaue fell vnto earthe eue fygge tree casteth fygges shaken myghtye wynde heauen vanysshed awaye scroll rolled together al mountaynes yles moued place kynges earth great men ryche men chefe captaynes myghty men euery bondman euery free man hyd selues denes rockes hylles sayd hylles rockes fall v byde v fro presece sytteh seate wrathe lambe great day wrathe come hable endure syxte seale maye vnderstande great mysery affliccion shal aryse procured thorow anty christ shal enuy christ true holynes whiche shal esteme make himselfe god shall set furthe al thinges owne glorye honour pompe iust pleasure holy word god shall doe wt wylfulnes tyrannye false doctrine hypocritical supersticious holynes man ordinaunces shal haue wonderful successe ther therfore shall great affliccions aryse world terryble earthquake shalbe sene whiche shal euidently declare greuous myseries whiche shal ensue ther vpon thinges shalbe knowne accordyng vnto maner scripture prophetes christ himselfe also thorow lypse darckenyng sunne moone token bloode thorow fallynge starres wha holy state vnderstande spiritualty standerous person shal reygne whiche shall blemyshe ordre state wyckednes shal muche hurt bothe vnto bodyes soules whose welth saluacions sake ought dutye office wyllyngly gladly gyue loose owne bodyes lyues truth tyme heretikes enemye christ hell hounde mahomet dyd aryse east party worlde maynteyners ydols ymages monkery false religion danable perpetuall vowes purgatory byeng sellyng mass mony pryde pompe spiritualtie specially sea rome decree cursyng emperor kynges theft robbery warres murthers finite without nober brought suche misery slader heuines tong expresse say aryse west partes world wyl holy goost sygnifye expresse place suche wordes men doe vse wha wyl expresse hyghest sorowes perplexites myseries tyme p vii chapter texte p sewe foure angel stande foure corner earth holdyng foure wyndes earth wynde blowe earth nether see nether eny tree saw another angel ascende rysinge sunne seale lyuynge god cryed loude voyce foure angel whome power geuen hurte earth sea saying hurte earth nether sea nether tree tyll haue sealed seruauntes god forheades perteyneth also vnto syxt seale syngular comforte vnto right faithfull whiche tossed persecuted worlde truthes sake godlynes theseiiiangellesfoure angel vnderstande noysome minister whiche goe aboute hynder bothe lyfe doctrine gospel true faith messenger antichrist scattrid thoroweout whole worlde doe great hurte vnto al men euery degre whiche isthe earth sea tree holy angell sygnified earth sea tree holy angel ascendeth rysing sonne hath token seale lyuyng god lord iesus christ hath onely comaunded gospel preached vnto al creature also thorowe godly power doth hinder would stop let doth thorow ordinary minister wel spirituall also temporall sorte cause men haue vnderstanden angell ye good emperour constantyne maye also whome fauiour christe dothe set doctryne gospell christen lyfe againste tyannes antychrystes angell therfore shall delyuer electe child god myddes wycked worlde shall marke seale token marke blessed whiche fayth loue innocency shall make knowen vnto whole christen congregacion p hearde nombre whiche sealed sealed c xliiii crybes child israel trybe iuda sealed xii trybe ruben sealed xii trybe gad sealed twelue trybe aser wer sealed xii trybe neptalim sealed twelue trybe manasses sealed xii trybe symeon sealed xii trybe leuy sealed xii trybe isacar sealed xii trybe zabulon sealed xii trybe ioseph sealed xii trybe beniamin sealed xii thus hathe sauiour iesus christ chosen churche cogregacion onely gentyles heathen also iewes trybes generacions ye whiche euen passion christ infynite noumbres scattered dyspersed abrode thorow ye whole world conuerted vnto ye christen faithe receyued ye baptisme christendome holy apostle also preached first vnto iewes syncere pure christen faith nombre iewes ye conuerted doubtles greate throughout whole world continuaunce tyme increased place ye customeable vse holy scripture marked sealed certen appoynted prescribed nomber vncerten vnprescrybed nomber yet full perfyght nomber xii time xii thousande doea certen nomber put signifye vncerten multitude make hundreth xliiii thousande cause certen rehersed amonge xii trybes necessarye searche euen many true christian also thorowe wyll god conuerted vnto true faythe trybe flocke iacob shal dayly conuerted whan christen religion shalbe restored reformed rule square holy scripture first bylded apostle bysshops prymatyue churche texte p behelde lo great multitude man coulde nombre al nation people tonges stooe seate lambe clothed longe whyre garmentes palmes handes cryed loude voyce saying saluacio as r bed sytreth vpon seate god vnto lambe angel stode compase seate elder foure beastes fell seate face worshypped god saying amen blessing glorye wysdom thankes honour power myght vnto god euermore amen sayd wer many turned vnto ye christe faith ye tribe ye israelite fleshe many yea infynite nombres heathe people tounges nacions eue fro ye antyquyte bothe sybylla mercurius also euydetly certeinly patriarke iacob ye xlix genesis lykewyse ye prophetes doe testifie dyd looke wayte sauiour messias ye christendome dayly increase waxe greater whole worlde thus became right child abraham israel ye faith glorye prayse god vnto al holy patriarkes alwayes respect tha eyther lande chanaan ye temple ierusalem yet circumcision cuttyng ye foreskynne bodily vnnaturall dysobedient child posterite yea fynally maner iewyshe ceremony christian conuerted fro heathe whole world dyd imbrace receyue gospel desyrously feruently framing lyues euery condicion therafter reformyng forsakyng olde heathnyshe synfull lyfe maners pacient maner affliccions constant faythfull euen vnto deathe true saythe relygions sake againste ydolatrye supersticion false religion haue receyued euerlastyng blisse wherin laude honour god ioyes heauen euerlastyngly also doe lesse long remayne warrefare transitorye lyfe wherin walke beyng marked chosen innocencie vertue godlynes thus euen vpon earth possesse soules pacience maner assaultes temptacions true confidence god quiet conscience meanes take tast blissed hope loue vntil obteyue euerlastynge saluacion texte p one elder answered saying vnto whiche arayed longe whyte gatmentes whence came sayde vnto lorde thou wotest sayde whiche came great tribulacion made garmentes large made whyte bloude lambe therfore presence seare god serue daye nyght temple sytteth seate wylld well amonge shall honger nether thirst nether shall sunne lyght nether eny heate lambe whiche myddes eare shall fede shall leade vnto fountaynes lyuynge water god shall wype awaye teares eye certen elder asked iohn geue occasion teache instructe iudged thought blessed one whiche saw suche honour god garnysshed whyte garmentes iohn made quicke answer sayeng whiche doe cleaue vnto christe true perfyght faith faithe truthes sake suffer paciently wyllingly lyctio euer god shal sende vnto thei shalbe great honour estimacio god suche assc ybe al perfightnes vertue godlynes vnto owne workes yet vnto owne fulfyllyng lawe wherin must nedes knowledge selues gyltye synful together vnto merytes healthsome passion christ whiche shall euer rightuousnes whome put trust confydence sake readye suffer whatsoeuer god shall lay vpon holy blessed whiche beginne lyfe haue delight godlynes euen free spirite thorowe faythe sure grace mercye god shal continue euer towarde length shall haue cleare fruicion goodnes shall fully possesse doe hope looke suche men true seruauntes god fully stablysshed right faythe true loue whiche thorowe grace god shall neuer fall muche god father ouerse r whose deare louynge child lacke treasure neyther corporall spirituall eyther worlde worlde come lyue blessedly peace quientnes conscience god readye pleasure god goe thorowe welthe woo worlde whome maner creature hurte muche lorde fauoreth vnto whome haue vtterly geue committed selues haue offred vp vnto pleasant sacrifice oblacion faythe true christen loue perfyght hope christ suffered death redemed bloude forsake graciously rule gouerne thorowe holy gospel wil instructe rightuousnes begynne world shal enioye frute therof lyfe euerlastyng thus thorowe grace mercye god shal ouercome al woe vexacion remayne pacient persecucion yea mery ioyfull also strengthen comforte whiche dystrybuteth plentifull grace vnto worke al holy vertuous workes also beyng owne workes wyll yet crowne rewarde austen sayeth kyngdome heauen eternaliy viii chapter texte p opened seuenth seale sylence heauen space halfe houre sawe vii angelles standynge god wer geuen seuen trompertes another angel came stode aulter hauinge golde senser muthe odoures geuen vnto offce prayer sa re vpon golden aulter seate smoke odoures whiche came prayer sa re ascended vp god angelles hande angell toke senser fylled fyre aulter caste earth voyces made thondrynges lyghtnynges earthquake hathe ofte bene sene great trouble muche vexacion thorowe prouysion god rest quietnes hath folowed tymes thus shall continue euen ascencion christe vntyll worldes ende rayne sunne shal shyne afterwarde wyll cloudye darcke againe euen whan faythfull haue ioy god victorye dragon commeth new dysquietnes perplexite whan wycked angel spirites thorowe membres mynisters shall set vp abhominacion synne wyckednes hurtefull noysome vnto soule sathan dyd vnto iob tyme came accompanyed selfe child god come vii saye many mightye stronge power graunted permitted vnto doe harme christ ye true faythfull kyng father kyngdome churche child commeth standeth hyghe pryest alter god oblacion owne bodye christ lorde bothe priest altar oblacion himselfe standeth faythfull electe golden censer hyghest loue humilyte thorowe whiche gaue selfe synnes al world moost bytter standerous death perpetuall reconciliacion beleue vnto onely one eternall priest christ doe faythfull holy blessed christian render gyue vnperfyte deuocion thanck e geuynge feruent peticions prayer hope loue fayth whiche receyueth good parte maketh acceptable vnto ye father censer prayer swete smellynge rightuousnes holynes wherwith full aboundant plentuous sufficient electe begynnynge worlde vntyll ende therof meanes nother wyse may prayer holy faythfull come vnto god namely thorowe handes merites passio take pleating god thorowe whiche thing dilyghteth pleaseth lord god right well nowe yf holy electe shal thus offre vp necessity praiers vnto god thorowe christ whiche onely medyatour betwene god father mankynde wyll mercifull god heare shall punyshe wycked tyrannes oppressours faythfull fyerye dartes thonderboltes plage whiche wont vse dyuers wayes terryble punyshemet wycked godlesse prynces tyrannes bothe bodely gostly muche sathan whole kyngdome shalbe amased therat texte p seuen angel seuen trompettes prepared selues blowe first angell blewe made hadle fyre whiche myngled bloude caste earth thirde parte earth set fyre thirde parte tree burnt greue grasse brente seconde angell blewe great mountayne burnyng fyre caste see thirde parte sea turned bloude thirde parte creature lyfe dyed thirde parte shyppes destroyed christ bringeth punyshementes passe thorowe good euyll angel euen owne pleasure vnto lorde nothing euell vnprofytable muche onely make good euyll well ynoughe first plage churche christ vnderstandynge interpretacion holy scripture whiche euen first assaulted dyuerse dangerous heresyes whiche sprang vp reason dyuersytie vnderstandyng amonge wryters teacher reason wherof infynite schisemes disse cions perels dangerous vproures sprynge aryse cause many councels holden christendome suffred great decaye many swarued suche tyme god mercye gaue peace andthe tree quietnes churche small season sayde tree shall vnderstande people maner nacions degree christendome small nomber tyme athanasius seconde plage foloweth afterwarde whote natural strength fearcenes men specially whiche betwene prince ruler assaulted wycked fyende ambicion power dominion whiche wycked fyende dyd rayse vp godly holy teacher rooted errours heresyes contencion deuysion churche betwene ruler laytie clergye hath bene occasion great myseries betwene grecian romaynes emperor kynges pope byshops bothe spirituall temporall regiment deuyllyshe burning fyre pryde hathe bredde infynite vnspeakeable hurte vnto churche christ euen sprang many warres battels burnynges destroyng landes suche common harmes wyll spirite god sygnifye trouble losse destruccion eleme te fyre water ayer earth man sure safegarde texte p thirde angel blew fell great starre heauen burnyng lampe fell thirde parte ryuers fountaines water name starre called wormwod thirde parte turned wormworde many men dyed water made bytter fourth angell blewe thirde parte sonne smytten thirde parte mone thirde parte starres thyrde parte darckned daye smytten thirde parte shoulde shyne lykewyse nyght behelde hearde angell flyinge thorowe myddes heauen saying loude voyce woo woo woo inhabiters earth voyces come trompe thre angel whiche yet blowe thirde plage came vpon starres heauen vpon holyest people whiche taken spirituall state order monckes fryer priestes whiche thorowe hypocrysye haue heaped vnto selues money goodes treasure haue gotten landes dominion whiche great dyuision among wheras world haue learned faith loue knowledge nothing slandered offended deceyued seduced sore hyndered bothe faythe godly lyuynge behaueour bothe whiche vtterly decayed parson great vndoyng dystruccion bothe bodye soule thus swete hony christen loue concorde among order turned bytter wormewoode many soules destroyed fourthe plage maye well vnderstande breakyng turkes sarasens whiche worthye well deserued scourge whyppe whiche shoulde scourge punyshe christendome fallyng synne dyssolutenes hath already happened iii partes earth asya europa africa hath gotten wholy handes hathe also dyuerse tymes attempted italy spaine hath alreadye gotten austry etschlande parte hungry thinketh great losse wonderfull destruccion hath vnderstandynge suche great myseries perplexites destruccions dothe scripture sygnifye diuerse place darcknes sunne moone starres sayth onely thirde parte destroyed syngnifyeth thereby dyd continue dyuerse place men addressyng theselues vnto repentaunce amendement haue dysappoynted suche enemyes dyscharged selues euery tymes myseries plage returned againe afterwarde dangerous hurtful intollerable bothe plage dyd increase get ouerhande daylye lykewyse also synne worde god true loue againste peace quietnes vertue godlynes dyd cease raged contynually manyfest clere gospel euen spirituall sort haue lyuynge gospel wherunto extreme enemyes bothe worde deade thousande partes secular laye sorte yet vnder pretence coloure christen good zeale wheras seke nothing owne pryuate lucre euydent manyfest p ix chapter texte p fyfte angell blewe sawe starre fall heauen vnto earth geuen kaye bottomlesse pyt opened botomlesse pyt smoke pyt arose smoke great fornace sunne ayer darckned reason smoke pyt came smoke locustes vpon earth vnto geuen power scorpyons earth haue power comaunded shoulde hurte grasse earthe nether grene thinge nether tree onely men whiche haue seale theyr foreheades commaunded kyll vexed fyue monethes payne payne commeth scorpion hath sto ge man lyke openyng fourthe seale god become man washe away synnes wyckednes euen deuyll whiche counterfetter god workes imageneth meanes set vp stablyshe maner intollerable errours augment kyngdome goeth make selfe god fyght stryue againste gospell godlynes thorowe iudgement god fallen downe heauen vnto earthe hath receyued thorowe iudgement god thorowe permission key hell botomles pyt wyckednesse euen lyke christ ascended gone vp thorow merites rightuousnes hath opened heauen hath receyued kyngdome god faithfull electe hellyshe botomles pyt arose smoke worldly wysdome fleshly lustes whiche al godlynes planted christ apostle thorow preachyng gospel obscured darckened rysen vp locustes say falselocustes teacher heretykes worldly suttell prelate olemen sophisters thorow proude doctrine man ordinance pompe couetousnes haue done muche harme churche heartes faythful thorow permission god suffered euen synne contemnynge god worde men haue loued selues muche christ whiche worde god haue made contemned wt syngyng fast swyfte mumblynge vp therof without vnderstandynge haue profyted edyfied eyther selues therby also hyghe scoles vniuersyties aristotle phylosophy haue made worde god darcke obscure philosophical dysputacions haue made vncerten doubtfull vnprofytable vnto churche maye well appeare frute ende al studyes haue bene nothynge el couetousnes pryde worldly honour promocion suttyll wyttes dyuises haue done wonderfull muche hurte thorowe myghtye power vertue christ churche haue bene hyndered dysappoynted purpose shoulde hurte harme true faythfull whiche increase waxe grene thorowe faythe godly workes exercyses whiche spirite god would suffer hyndered shoulde preserued faith loue wyll worde god holynes vertue men whiche haue made couenaunt pryde couetousnes fleshly lust pleasure enuye hatred excesse suche geuen vnto vse owne pleasure muche seale token god notwithstandynge shoulde kyll neyther muche many myght conuerted amende onely punyshe vexe conscyences plage season namely space fyue monethes whiche maye vnderstande sygnifye fyue hundreth yeares wherin suche thinges haue bene sene practised suffered churche god payne vexacion long tyme hath bene extreme conscience fearefully heau ly tormented great synnes whiche thinge dyd first sprynge false doctrine man tradicions haue kept example costrayned filthy chastitie pryestes monckes nonnes glotonous fastynge myserable torment eare confession dreadfull feare purgatorye pollynge pardon excessyue couetous pouertye beggyng fryer vnsa yable venomous stynges doe vexe tormente wyll forsake set naught token seale god worde texte p dayes shall men seke death shall fynde shall desire dye death shall flye symilytude locustes lyke vnto horse prepared vnto battayll heades crounes lyke vnto golde face bene face men heere heere weme teeth teeth lyon habbergions habbergions yron sounde wynges sounde charertes whe many horse runne together battayle tayles lyke vnto scorpious stynges tayles power hurte men fyue monethes kynge ouer whiche angell bottomlesse pyt whose name hebrew tonge abadon greke tonge appollyon saye destroyer one woe past beholde two wooes come yet locustes gresshopers shall strong myghtye churche shall greuously vexe oppresse faythfull professours gospel abyde beare false religion shal afflycte persecuted shall wyshe thousande tymes rather dead alyue griefe sorowe suche tormented conscience vnspeakeable men maye better knowe suche locustes token marked syt vpon horse hauyng vpon heades crounes garnysshed golde precious stone haue face lyke vnto men face louyng lowly amyable wordes outwarde pretence effecte vertue strength lesse weaker tha woman garnysshed pleasant heere euen nothynge el token hypocrysye besydes haue terryble teth whiche sygnifyeth myghtye hurte euen lyke lyon without feare able resysted muche armed habbergions yron hangynge together chaynes behemoth knottes byndinge knytting selues together councels decree seme inuyncible able ouercome whole world thunder cursynges suspension excommunicacions maynteine pompe euen lyke fearfull army whiche warre fare woulde make worlde afrayde flye pardon bulles euen wynges ouer hylles dale ouer sea lande poyson noysomly vnto death doe bodyly weapon yet whan bulles parchement wil helpe wyll vse prycke sworde also kyng gouernour people hath nother proper name appollion say destroyer incarnate deuyll lyke aduersarye christ bothe name deede sauiour preseruer heuy woo mysery happen vnto churche christ shall come yet ii besydes texte p syxt angell blewe herde voyce foure corner golden aulter whiche god sayinge syrte angell whiche trompe loce foure angelles whiche bounde great ryuer euphrates foure angelles looced whiche prepared houre daye moneth yeare slee thirde parte men nombre horseman warre xx time x hearde nombre thus sawe horse vysion sate hauynge fyry habergions iacynte coloure brymstone heades horse wer heades lyon mouthes went forth fire smoke brymstone thre thirde parte men kylled saye fyre smoke brymstone whiche procede mouthes power mouthes tayles tayles lyke vnto serpentes heades dyd hurte syxte angelycall deuyll whiche set syxt seale dyd blowe tyme also puttynge forthe voyce christendome god ought honoured golde pure syncere faythe tyme holy apostle iohn heard spirite voyce without doubt voice christ kynge honour whiche voyce said vnto angel wickednes thing whiche thou wilt take hande permytte tyme exercyse thy power hurtynge vndoynge wycked vngodly amendement furtheraunce christen exercise faithfull electe poure hypocrytical frowardnes hyghe state malygnante churche whiche hitherto hath bene somwhat bounde hath great name eue lyke euphrates muche vnlyke vnto holy iordan vnto flode syloa say prymatyue churche apostle hope grace recouerye saluacion euphrates nothing sounde good together full death destruccion helpe iii foure streames whiche went easy vnderstande whiche went decaye holy christen churche austin ambrose tyme fyue monethes saye fyue hundreth yeares went eue one tyme namely tyme councel holden laterane redy murther flaye thirde parte mankynde wt felowes dyd greuously hurte person goodes conscience bodye prosperyte welth soules thorowe horryble error faithe relygion outwarde ceremony thorow man ordinaunces tradicions bothe manyfest holy worde god also ordinaunce holy prymatiue churche apostle great nomber horseman doth open vnderstandinge vnto reader men maye easyly perceyue commyng vp maner one tyme frutes shall shewe declare sufficiently among horseman came captain ridyng vpon hyghe horse mule highe pompe pretendinge highe wysdom gostly power yet holy brother maynteyners christes churche pretende ryde harnes sallet armed prepared many ordinaunces decree statute whiche ala remedye christen faythe lytle furthered well fensed armed habbergions one ryng folded nother fower folde set fyre furious madnesse pure syncere doctrine profession gospell yelowe enuye hatered malyce also fylthye desyre couetousnes golde whiche thinges goe alwayes together againe sauering brymstone hipocritishe filthy chastitie vnmete odious christe harte thicke vpon muche lesse christen eares heare christen tong speake pompe power subdue symple humble dysciples christ contemners wycked world lyke vnto power myght lyon wytte man able resysted withstanden yet power handes armes mouthes whiche commeth cursynge suspendyng excommunicating threatenynge fire feare hell purgatorye suche lyke firebrandes brymstone oh many right godly faythfull constant men wemen haue bene murthered wtin foure fiue hundreth yeares horseman whose power onely mouthes performauce spiritual tirannie dyuised spy serchers whiche called inquisitores hereticae prauitatis spye suche toke heretykes saule one suche tyme ra ed spitefully faithfull ierusalem damasco tayle lyke vnto tayle scorpion basiliske whiche goe folow example prince lordes temporal magistrate whiche assistent vnto execute tyrannye bothe otherwyse speciallye general councels whiche pleasure euen thoughe emperours yet must breake promyses free pasporte passage bothe honour othes matter concerne spiritual state pompe lyberties ordinauces neuer much holy worde god texte remnant men kylled plage repented dedes theyr handes shulde worshyppe deuyls ymages golde syluer brasse stone wood nether se nether heare nether go also repented theyr murther theyr sorcery nether theyr fornicacyon nether theyr thefte howe heuy terryble might power deuil antichrist yea many faithfull electe god haue bene tormented slayne bothe body conscience yet euen tyme wer many remayned alyue whiche mercifull hande god dyd preserue godlynes thorow ayde helpe escaped handes tyrannes euen lyke maner dyd also many remayne wicked purpose cruel tyrannye godles blasphemous lyfe whiche withstanding would bothe called also estemed taken holy spiritual men yet beleue haue nede repent therfore procede goe forwarde tradicions men transgressio wherof punishe sharply transgression commaundement god doe esteme maner lyghter tha nothing taking suche synne may well ynoughe dyspensed remitted thus meane tyme please serue honour deuel ydolatry supersticion inuocacion sayntes vnto whome praye say father heauen halowed name euen vnto image bothe men weme whiche thing lyuing deuyl taught thoughe saintes shoulde desire suche thing rather dyspleased therwith vnto whiche sainctes also make set vp image golde syluer stone woode euen vnto true sainctes also martired put death speakynge preaching suche heathnyshe customes toke wicked abhominable supersticions diuil lyshnes inuocate honour suche false goddes doe thinges manifestly wil denie haue vnderstading therof selues eue lyke vnto false goddes become madde farre wittes heare see tha ydols false goddes wil heare repentaunce al muche lesse wil performe wyll rather confirme mainteyne deuillyshe ydolatrye false religion sword fyre murther poyson yea sometime ashamed practyse sorcerye witchecrafte mainteyne wickednes againste true faith religio wil lyue whordom whosoeuer say nay eue force beyng extreme enemyes vnto holy matrimony thus bleare blinde whole worlde falsehede lyeng mainteyne possession infinite blasphemyes whiche e e ydolatry worldly force tyrannye haue euer done p x chapter texte p sawe another mightie aungell come doune heauen clothed cloude raynebowe vpon hed face sunne fe e pyllers fyre hande lytle boke open put right fote vpon sea lefte fote yearth cried loude voyce lion roreth cried vii thonders spake voyces seuen thonders spoken voyces write hearde voyce heauen saying vnto seale vp thinges vii thonders spake write strong angel sygnifye none thing sauiour iesus christ whiche reueled suche vision vnto iohn profyte comfort faithfull churche congregacion warnyng vnto synfull world whiche suche euil tyme suche great perplexyte dangerous warrefare christen churche vpon earth commeth downe heauen ayde succour according vnto promes appeareth vnto iohn euen thoughe commynge downe heauen clothed manyfest visible cloude whiche signifyeth holy manhode euen went vp also vnto heauen dwelleth withthe raynebowe v grace ayde prouydence raynebowe sygnifieth heauenly imperious crowne gracious gouernauce ouer faithful electe whiche carefull sorowfull mercye daylye ayde thinges necessarye expedient face countenaunce bryght pleasant full mercye euen lyke vnto sonne himselfe sonne worlde saye comfort delyght ioye felicitie faithful againe mighty stronge rightuous iudgementes towardes godlesse wicked whiche stampeth peces burneth fire neuer quenched iesus christ lorde sauiour come againe heauen lytle meke euangelycall booke namely newe testament whiche olde also comprehended booke contemptuous estimacion vnto sage wyse philosopher highe lerned doctor pompous proude prelate muche cleane lost tempelles great space euen tyme ieremye prophete beyng songe yearely monastery college vowes rule wherunto sworne required without maner vnderstandynge feruentnes spirite whiche sought necessarilie required holy scripture boke dothe christ bring garnisshed outwardly golde siluer precious stone face shewe onely man reade thoughe sufficient onely kysse shal bring open euery man maye reade vnderstade owne mother tong also scholes child taught come worlde hath set feete vpon al earth also iles sea whiche vnknowen euen lyke true faithe also readyly ioyfully receyued whiche knewe nothing ignorant vnlearned came grecian romaynes whiche thing maye vnderstanden left right foote maye better vnderstanden loude voyce great noyse holy byble maketh suche tyme spred abrode speches tonges ouer hundrethes thousandes people short tyme great wonder meruell faithfull hyghe furtheraunce edyfieng christen doctrine knowledge god vtter confusion feare whole diuilyshe hellyshe flocke congregacion euen lyon stocke iuda immediately therupon came vii thonders saye moostvii thonders godly christen interpreter holy scripture famous throughout whole worlde ambrose austen ierom gregory cypriane hylarie diuerse whiche tyme haue written taught excelletly profytablye churche congregacion christ euer dyd haue taught brought lyght worde god purely sincerely notwithstandyng whatsoeuer schole writer sophysters pompous byshops monkyshe mumry haue many yeres decreed dyuised contrary vncerten vnstable doctrine fayned ceremonyes fonde tradicions newe strange article faythe whiche haue grounde god worde cleane contrarye bothe vsage also doctrine holy auncient father prymatiue churche nowe added shoulde written thonders spake let vnderstande wyll thinke coniecture prophecye noble excellent gyfte god science prynting geuen first vnto germaynes whiche estemed moost rude barbarous people thorowe whome onely newe testament hath bene renewed interpreted translated euen naturall fountaine tong wherin wrytten also whole olde testament holy hebrew tong besydes named many teacher wryters holy churche went first worlde bothe worde deede noysed abrode power gospell renewynge therof ascribed vnto onely whiche preache teache tyme vnto holy bysshops primatyue churche whiche preached taught first throughout whole christendome bysshops moost parte domme blynde godly doctrine vtterly drowned worldly pompe lustes pleasure wicked dyssolutenes texte p angell whiche sawe stande vpon sea vpon earth lyfte vp hande heauen sware lyueth euer whiche created heauen thinges therin sea thinges whiche therin lenger tyme dayes voyce seuenth angell shall begynne blowe euen mysterye god shalbe fynished preached seruauntes prophetes christe taketh anothe sweareth god heauenly father euen great earnest feruencye holynes tyme glorious laste comminge iudge worlde bothe quicke dead nowe alreadye nighe hande whan victorye prophecyed fulfylled antichrist victorye seuenth angel christ selfe spirite yet come helyas last daye must blowe forth accordinge vnto office past shoulde together fulfylled prophetes dyd euer prophecye kyngdome messias sauiour whole worlde whiche hyghest misterye whiche thinges patriarkes prophetes yea apostle also christ selfe dyd speake namely tyme kyngdome heauen commyng commynge christ highest honour glorye whiche shalbe manifest knowen vnto men vnto whole world texte p voyce whiche hearde heauen spake vnto againe sayde go take lytle boke whiche open hande angell standeth vpon sea vpon earth went vnto angell sayde geue lytle boke sayd vnto take eate vp shal make thy belly bytter shalbe thy mouthe swete hony toke lytle boke hande eate vp mouthe swete assone hade eaten bellye bytter sayde vnto thou must prophecye againe amonge people nacions tongue many kynges place myght begynnyng xi muche conueniently haue bene appoincted matter iohn person faithfull christian specially person whiche teacher ye churche god holy bysshops apostolicall men heareth voyce god speakinge thus vnto thou wylt doe performe thy office vocacion truly iustly goe thy waye appointe thy selfe therunto withall thy might power take thy hande holy open mooste cleare cronicle booke holy gospell worde god receyue holy vnderstandinge therof holy goost thorow feruent praier reade therin faythe loue moost earnest zeale christ hym selfe telleth shoulde onely reade synge wryte endyte shoulde moost gredy desyre euen deuoure vp foode god heauenly breade faythfull beleuers e dygest bowel moost cleane holsome foode whiche thing come passe bytternes repentaunce sorowe heuynes hearte conscience specially vnto knoweth muche wyll god feleth spirite weake frayle fleshe wylde dysobedient mynde stubbourne obstinate spirite god el may thus vnderstande whan man vnderstandeth worde god knoweth ought spred furth vnto saye whole churche god truth ought spoken vnto blynde worlde yet done great perell danger bodye lyfe doutles bytter vnto yet withstandinge swete mouthe thorowe comforte ioye truth thorowe ioyful promes gospell rightuousnes holynes thorow christ sauiour whole world al tymes al iohn vision toke also instruccion thereof foloweth p xi chapter texte p geuen rede lyke vnto rodde sayd vnto ryse meat temple god aulter worshyp therin quier whiche within temple cast meate geuen vnto gentile holy citie shall treade vnder fote xiii monethes wyll geue power vnto two witness shall prophesye thousande two hundered ix dayes clothed sacke clothe two olyue tree two candelstyckes standynge god earth yf man wyll hurte fyre shall procede mouthes consume enemy yf man wil hurte wyse must kylled haue power shut heauen rayne dayes prophesyinge haue power ouer water turne bloude smite earth maner plage often wyll lorde doth teuele shewe vnto iohn wyll vysyte reforme churche beyng sore fallen decaied wha tyme shalbe thorowe apostolical men godly parson haue eaten vp dysgested booke god great swetnes plesantnes haue bene feruent earnest set furth wyl god thus geueth hym e wande hande dyd also vnto ezechiell measure serche rightuousnes church state euery one specially whiche reason office vocacion ought haue speciall respecte regarde seruyce god among whiche bysshops highe speciall doctor teacher churche whiche vnderstandethe quier ment quiere muche maisters ruler quiere mooste wicked vngodly compared lykened vnto heathen geuen delyuered vp vnto punysshed heathen vngodly supersticious people geuen al ydolatrie whether spiritual secular shal treade destroy defyle churche christ long time whiche vnderstande xlii monethes ye saye iii yeares halfe whiche might well sygnifye iiixlii monethes hundreth yeares halfe tyme muche false doctrine many supersticious ceremony came first ye churche manifest worde god whiche thinges sprang vp thorow pompe pryde couetousnes presumpcion spiritual prelate watchman named selues ought haue bene dede office callyng two witness repentauncethe ii witness amendement lyfe take gospel hande againe restore bryng forthe booke againe enoche elyas wicked tyme cainites no floode enoche studyed went without doubte bothe word dede reforme world reduce vnto true faith god perfyght loue neyghboure againe wherunto moued holy goost whiche worke speake yea parauenture also write thorowe bokes enoche whiche nowe gotten lyke wyse elyas also time ye lawe wonderfull zeale feruentnes word deed thorow mocion holy goost whiche worketh minister god whan seeth tyme accordynge person place requireth therfore bathe receyued one rewarde saluacion remayned immortall prophecied come againe spirite latter day iudgement resiste confounde wycked antichrist heale oyle lenitie suche apte receyue el fyre feruente zeale confounde wycked enemyes god bothe worde deade enoche elyas dyd commaundement ordinaunce god tyme whan vpon wicked earth lyke also suche men might founde tyme name writynges doynges one place earth moued spirite worde lyke zeale god euery one gyfte grace geuen vnto moued saye holy goost godly mynde lyke purpose nacions people person circumstance required suche lyke frendes minister god shall many greuous trouble alwayes deuised attempted wicked malignant churche bothe good name bodye lyfe also goodes haue nother refuge succour comforte helpe weapon defende onely holy eternall inuyncible worde god mouthes handes whiche confoundeth aduersaries deadly enemyes whiche euen selues longer mainteyne euyll naughtye cause worse make tyll length shall vtterly confounde destroy themselues ii minister spirite god workynge loue feruentnes softnes burnynge zeale lyke vnto enoche elyas haue power thorowe spirite god whiche worketh thinges minister procure obteyne god grace vengeaunce accordynge faith zeale ye furtherauce goddes glorye profite reformacion faythfull christen churche necessitie conueniencie shall require euen lyke elyas ouer water whan thorowe prayer obteyned god shoulde rayne vpon earth space three yeares agayne also fyre heauen mocked contemned offyce testymonie texte p haue fynisshed testimonye beast came bottomlesse pyt shall make warre shal ouercome kyl bodyes shall lye stretes great citee whiche spiritually called zodom egipte lord crucified people kynredes tonges nacions shall se bodyes thre dayes halfe shall suffer bodyes put graues dwel vpon earthe shall reioyce ouer glad shal sende gyftes one another two prophetes vexed dwelt earth hath alwayes tyme tyme bene well sene howe beast hathe behaued hymselfe towarde messagiers minister god whiche sent vnto specially vnder achab manasses suche lyke kynges ydolatrous hethenysshe priestes whiche serued false goddes whiche persecuted faythfull minister god cursed contemned burnt drowned farre god permytted whiche thing best vnto person suffered suche thinges synguler profyte faythfull churche congregacion yet persecucion doctrine workynge faythfull euer vpright lyuely good holy name commendacion godly feruent zeale also wonderfully preserued vtter shame confusio abhomynable terryble beast member lymmes example whole world doe testifye beare wynes specially euen tyme also moost true infallyble storye prouydence holy worde god citie christ dayly crucifiedthe great citie figure symilitude citie ierusalem whiche sheadyng bloude apostle hath receyued iust due rewarde deserued lykewyse wycked churche corrupte poysoned sathan wherin beareth rule murtheringe faythfull frendes god minister gospell whose holy zeale truth god whiche haue preached coulde woulde suffer abyde vntyll alwayes length confounded vtterly destroyed whiche thinge shall vndoubtedly happen also vnto whiche doe resist withstande christen reformacion churche state order yea see already eye smell indignacion god terryble iudgement wherof haue bene earnestly faithfully warned neuer affrayd abasshed tyme holy seruauntes minister god shall fayne suffer muche trouble euen bytter moost slanderous death length whan thinges shall truly discussed worlde shall see perceyue true doctrine belefe faithfull godly impietie ye wycked obstinate blinde vngodly infydels whiche woulde neuer beleue thus fayth truth god shall haue victorye texte p thre dayes halfe spirite lyfe god entred stode vp vpon fete great feare came vpo al saw hearde great voyce heauen sayinge vnto come vp hyther ascended vp heauen cloude ennemyes sawe houre great earthquake enth parte citie fell earthquake slayne name men seuen remnaunt wer feared gaue glorye god heauen seconde woo past beholde thirde woo wyll come anone howe beast member wycked hethenyshe prelate sworne adherentes haue alwayes tyme long season cruelly dealt minister god word preacher truth ye moost sacred gospell playne euident ynoughe day vnto world thorowe cronicles whiche shall publyshed shall hydden vnto posteritie whan whome dyuerse godlye men haue bene persecuted murthered moost shamefully handeled spirituall prelate sworne adherentes onely true doctrine faythes sake tyme wyll come iudgement grace god whan holy men faythfull witness christ shall hyghe honour estimacion shall bryng passe preaching writinges monumentes whiche left behynde profyte edificacion churche true vnderstandynge truth landes nacions earth euer dyd lyfe tyme euydent happened vnto holy prophetes martirs shal wicked enemy contemners worde god christes true religion tre ble feare iudgement god vnworthely shall vndoutedly receiue due rewarde haue deserued extreme cruelty whiche haue shewed declared faythfull minister seruauntes god whiche rewarde shal receyue feare tremblynge sorowe smart paine despaire euerlasting shame confusion folowing whether suche thinge hath hitherto maye hereafter happen let euery true christen harte trusteth mercye god well consyder wey selfe p xii chapter texte p seuenth angell blewe made great voyces heauen saying kyngdoms worlde lordes christes shall raygne euer xxiiii elder whiche syt god seates fell vpon face worshipped god sayinge geue thankes lorde god almightye arte wast art come thou hast receaued thy great might hast raigned nacions angry thy wrath come tyme dead shoulde iudges thou shouldest geue rewarde vnto thy seruauntes prophetes sainctes feare thy name small great shouldest destroye whiche destroye earth al maye well referred vnto texte vision went purpose matter mencioned past shoulde vniuersall godlynes christen order eyther thorowe generall preaching gospel thorow whole world el thorow godly lyfe peace felicitie whiche maye tyme vpon earth possible inoughe thorowe grace god many good christen heartes doe trust hope shall come passe el maye vnderstande last iudgement sauiour christ quietnes whiche shall immediately folowe cruell persecucion antichrist blessed comfortable angel preacheth declareth trompet sure latter daye kyngdome christ shall appeare receyued nacions yles earth euen iewes also whiche length shal receyue knowledge errour shall confesse obstinacy ye wickednes belefe conuersacion wha shall see grace knowledge god manifestly reueled tongue speches thorowe holy worde god shal perceyue kyngdome christ true messias consist strayght narow corner canaan vnhappy citie ierusalem whiche vnhappye reason dyuision vnquietnes whole wyde worlde wherin shall one onely felowshyp congregacion seruauntes onely one almyghtie god alone holy prophetes whose faythe iewes haue alwayes made highe boast haue honoured praysed lyke wyse whole regiment flocke whole worldes messias sauiour whiche creation worlde hath appeared worlde al humylite xv hundreth yeares almoost longer lawe moyses dyd endure continue among iewes tyme delyueraunce egipte vntyll commynge christ whan toke manhode tyme reygne herode whan regiment gouernaunce toke ende lye soeuer feyne lande regyment vtopia whiche name casp wherof must shortly shamed holde peace confesse deceyte falsehede presumpcion damnable lye talmude false myserable blynde guydes rabbynes whose falsehede nowe open manyfest vnto worlde muche bokes made common thorowe benefyte printynge vnto men learnynge knowledge myserable people holy apostle paule prayeth hath thing fulfylled vnto whiche hoped whiche promysed god tyme vnto generacion euen maye come passe vpon earth right sone honour glorye kyngdome christ god shall appeare shal rule tyme vpon earth latter iudgement heauen euerlastynge blisse al holy patriarkes prophetes apostle martirs euer haue bene shall haue honour glorye whiche shall offre vp vnto euerlastinge true god sight goddes electe euerlastinge blisse kyngdome god messias sauiour iesus christ according doctrine infallyble moost true word god wicked vngodly heathen shall haue part honour glorye blisse shall suffer damned euerlastingly eternall wrath enuy hatred malyce despayre suche righteous iudgement god ouer men bothe quicke deade good bad euery one shall rewarded accordyng workes desertes iust iudgement almyghtye god without maner parcialytie respecte person whether high lowe estimacion worlde whether riche poore lande contrey euer holy faithful shal receiue christ euerlasting saluacion trust faith loue towarde god contrarye wyse wicked vngodly tyrannes aduersaries persecutours faithfull seruantes god obstinate blyndnes infydelitie contemninge goddes holy wyll worde shall peryshe euer shall remayne euerlastingly cursed damned withal wicked spirites thus farre semeth vnto doe vision prophecy reache hetherto past mencioned boke nowe whiche foloweth another reuelacion pertayning tyme man must seeke order scripture boke whiche compact together many diuerse vision without obserued order writinges prophetes learned doe knowe well ynoughe texte p temple god opened heauen sene temple arcke testament folowed lyghtnynges voyces thondrynge earthquake muche hayle might xii chapter well begynne wordes myght vnderstande taken preparacion vnto glorious newe reuelacio nowe sayde opened vnto temple god isthe temple god holy christen churche congregacion tyme trouble dyscencion batell participacion blisse heauen euerlastinge lyfe vnto wynne beare awaye victorye arke testamente isthe arke blessed holy manhode christ vnited knit one godlye nature euerlasting word god euer hath bene mercye stoole worlde al men onely comforte refuge ioye faythfull electe lyghtenynge noyse voice thonderyngethe lyghtnyng thondering c earthequake great hayle maye sygnifie terryble damnacion wicked euer el maye sygnifie synguler ernest wonderfull preparacion hearer reader lyke holy apostle iohn whiche sawe marke consyder dilygentlye necessarye marke consyder suche reuelacions vision doe folowe vpon suche token lyke whereunto happened sometymes also vnto prophetes holy scripture declareth texte p appeared great wonder heauen woman clothed sunne mo e vnder fete vpo heade crowne xii starres wt childe cried trauayling birthe pained ready delyuered appeared another wonder heaue beholde great red dragon hauing vii heddes ten horne vii crounes vpon heades tayle drue thirde part starres cast earth prophetes olde testament first dyd write plainely manifestly last whiche muche harder vnderstanded ezechiel daniel zacharie muche harder esaye ieremy eue new testament prophetycall boke latter prophecy reuelacions vision playne easy vnderstanded tha first muche vision maye manner interpretacio vision went heauen wherin great token dyd appeare must nedesheauen kyngdome heauen christen churche congregacion felowshyp faithfull begynnynge worlde vntyll ende therof christ selfe doth interprete woman whome angell herethe woma speaketh euerlasting mighty blissed worde god whiche bryght mightye sunne wherunto vnderstanding man fleshe subiecte clothed garnysshed ye faith confession patriarkes prophetes apostle martirs bothe olde newe testament word god holy gospel promised vnto v begynnynge beleued hath performed thorowe mercye goodnes god hath brought forthe borne vnto v christe sauiour worlde true faith christ came passe suche time nonother saluacion coulde wyse founde thorow workes lawe throughe sacrifice throughe good workes none power satisfye make holy onely righteousnes worde god became man namely sauiour christe sonne god marye whiche bothe nature god man one onely person whiche made satisfaccion al mankynde beyng wt childewith childe crienge place muche earnest lust desyre cryeng prayer holy prophetes dyd euermore desyre saluacion trusted throughe belefe worde god vnto promes made vnto whole worlde holy worde god christen faithe dyd appeare token congregacio churche beyng called god namely bloudythe drago dragon enemye man saluacion true faithe christ whiche wicked spirite lucifer felowshyp whose vii heades sygnifiedthe vii heades blasphemy wickednes wherwith worketh myschiefe x horne doe sygnifye great manyfolde tyrannye wherby worketh tothe x horne hynder hurt true faythe gospell iesus christ onely sauiour wherunto enemye aduersarye might power farre almightye god wyll permyt suffer whiche taketh helpe namely louers frendes gredy folowers worlde vngodlye tyrannes againste godly innocencye christen faithe dragon tayle sygnifieth might power minister deuell wherby dysyreth e tayle hurt electe yf god woulde suffer possible maye shoulde fall heauenly vertue godlines vnto loue worlde vnto earthly fleshely lustes affeccions texte p dragon stode woman whiche readye delyuered deuourt chylde sone borne brought forthe man childe whiche shoulde rule nacions rodde yron sonne taken vp vnto god seate woman fled wildernes place prepared god shoulde fede mii hundred lx dayes wycked spirite dyd bestowe might power promyse god thorowe dysobedience child israell whome alwayes stirred vp might come none effecte trueth god might dysappoynted faythe christ whome saluacion dothe consyste might blemysshed confounded also gospell might myxed man doctrine interpretacions errours goodnes truth mercye faythfulnes loue god greater power wickednes deuell al subtilties minister childe borne goddes worde became man truth victorye falsehede laye grounde vnder fote craft subtiltie deuell defeated wysdome god opened dysclosed vnto worlde childe christ euerlasting worde god whiche became man moost holy wombe virgin marye receyued taken god father throughe grace satisfaccion synne al world dyd merite deserue highe perfyte obedience humblenes glorye heauenlye father kyngdome heauen wherin ruleth euer euer truth christen faith religion gospell christ dyd alwaies suffre extreme sorowe payne beyng persecuted euen first iewes false apostle false coloured christian emperours kynges workemongers false wicked bysshops sorcerer nigromansers sarasens ydolaters epicure philosopher thethe taile dragon deuyll louers world spiritual prelate religious monkes frier c suche lyke horne crounes great tayle dragon whiche watcheth studieth seketh wayes meanes hurte hynder true faithe christen lyfe holsome doctrine saye sauiour christ faithfull cause doctrine gospell christen faithe hathe bene fayne suffer muche continually euen beginnyng worlde immediately christen faith first taught preached therfore many holy faithfull christianes haue bene fayne flee trueth gospel continuaunce tyme straunge vnknowen vnto moost parte hyghe learned doctours potentate throughout worlde althoughe true christen faithe alwayes preserued thoughe fewe abiecte person slender reputa ion continued longe space namely tyme constantine emperour whan christen churche semed maner haue escaped daunger perill decaye destruccion vntil tyme wherin appeareth againe wonderfully straunge maner despite al tirannes power hell nombring tyme constantine meane vntyll tyme euen nomber yeares shall euydentlye appeare reckenynge dayes yeares commune thing scripture man finde plainer vnderstanding place suche darke obscure place scripture man ought frowarde contencious let take folowe texte p great batayle heauen michael angel fought dragon dragon fought angel preuayled nether place founde heauen great dragon olde serpent called deuell sathanas cast whiche deceaueth worlde cast earth angel cast also power god holy worde god spirite christ maye vnderstande mychaell interpretacion lyke god gabriel strength god hath age tymes bene dryuen holde batel lucifer sathan pryde man wysdome whiche haue hindred true honour god true seruice religio god true faith haue euer withstanden holy pure gospell worde god hath alwayes victorie althoughe muche labour daunger sometyme without harme losse electe whiche thing shall continue vntyll suche tyme sauiour shall haue wil pleasure battell breath mouthe shall slaye sonne dragon damnable antichrist whiche thing ought continuallye call vpon mercye goodnes god stedfast perfight hope confidence hath taught v halowed bee thy name thy kingdome come thy wyll done lesse earth infalliblye heauen hade god shortened able gyue whatsoeuer hath commaunded v aske praye peace also quietnes elect faithfull lyue godlynes maye wysshed perfight also promysed thorowe prophetes hath bene hitherto lacke true sounde doctrine gospel smal space althoughe perfyght peace obteyned onely heauen eternall quiet kyngdome christe texte p hearde loude voyce saying heauen nowe made saluacion strength kingdome god power christ accuser oure brother caste downe whiche accused god daie night oeurcame bloude lambe worde testimonye loued lyues vnto death therfore reioyce heauens ye dwell wo inhabiters earth sea deuil come downe vnto whiche hathe great wrathe knoweth hath shorte tyme thus throughe spirite christ continual sincere preaching gospel sathan champio antichrist ouercome thus shal voyce prayse thankesgeuing faythful heard churche written saluacion thorowe faithe strength thorow loue kyngdome dominion churche become god nowe maye men see power god worde iudgement christ deuel whiche would haue roted rightuosnes faith christ would haue directed appointed christen men vnto rightuosnes workes hope owne satisfaccion wherby woulde alwayes haue founde occasion accuse men god vnder false pretence preachinge gospell hath disclosed suttell falsehede suche lyke declareth onely bloude lambe nothing el wype washe awaye synnes worlde yf trust god thorowe christ true lyuely faith thorowe grace mercye god rightuousnes christ dystributeth vnto al faithfull electe maketh partaker therof meanes sathan haue quarell workes faithfull whiche lyke thankfull parson remayne continue stedfastly true faith al maner affliccion aduersitie eue vnto death therfore true ioye godly conscience waxeth increaseth churche blisse saluacion beginneth worlde thorow faith faith worketh innocent godly lyfe thus continueth euerlastingly heauen contrarye parte woo vnto whiche seeke rightuousnes men certen place certaine time certaine workes certaine meates neuer fynde true rightuousnes thorowe falsehede wickednes deuil fall eyther desperacion el presumpcio wherunto satha applieth al study fall fro kingdo escape finger seketh nothing damnacio texte p dragon saw caste vnto earth persecuted woman brought forthe man childe woman geuen two winges great egle might flye wildernes place nourished tyme time halfe tyme presence serpent dragon caste oute mouthe water woman bene ryuer shoulde haue bene caught floude earth holpe woman earth opened mouth swalowed vp ryuer dragon cast mouth dragon wroth woman wet made warre wt remnaunt sede kepe comaundementes god haue testimonye iesus christe stode sea sande sathan whiche spirite lye marketh power faithe whiche commeth springeth god worde howe christ beyng borne faithful doth waxe increase thorowe holy godly workes acceptable vnto god goeth persecute gospel true holsom doctrine spirite christ electe circumspecte quickesyghted andthe wynges highe flyeng eagle god spirite resisteth drago geueth might power grace vnto christen soule flee sure place whiche contempt worlde loue world come solitarines quiet conscience crosse christ comfort remembraunce god word wynges escapeth sathan al spirites snare suggestion foode noryshment geue throughe grace mercy god vnto electe child god time word firste writen throughe moyses afterwarde declared throughe prophetes fulfilled christ preached al world throughe apostle tyme throughe mercye goodnes god renewed againe thousande ii thousande yeares iii thousande yet loger log euer please god wil haue hidden vnknowen vnto v cause nombre yeares boke obscure without synguler cosideracion disciple helyas receyuing maister also sayde ii thousande yeares past lawe lawe moyses continue lykewyse ii thousande yeares kingdome messias vpo earth also ii thousande yeares precisely reckened fullye accomplyshed rabbines interpreter iewes doe part cofesse declare ye serpet named drago doth neuer seace since tyme adam eue persecute faith worde god secret misterie christ merciful rightuous god taketh vseth falsehede wickednes sathan eue game sport may say ye sathan goeth hinder worcke grace god performaunce promise doeth damnacion wrath enuy malyce increase god grace throughe mercye aboundantlye multiplyed men true rightuousnes holy blessed seede sauiour christ perfight effectuous maketh hast full perfyght blisse saluacion faithfull electe althoughe notwithstandinge infinite wickednes sathan neuer ceaseth euer angrye deuyseth continually one mischefe vpon anothers necke faithful furtherauce honour profite length yea preseruacion trueth eternal worde god furtheraunce confirmacion true faith loue hope whiche olde serpente wont continually fight al felowship companie wicked spirites kyndes blasphemy vice whiche seede generacion lyke maner vertues grace holynes innocencye saluacio frutes god worde spirite christ whiche dothe spring obediece obseruacion comaundementes god farre weakenes imperfightenes man able whiche weakenes sauiour mankynde first borne child god doth accomplyshe helpeth lacke man weakenes cause became man brother might better knowe infirmitie weakenes thus vision reueled vnto thought standinge vpon sande sea p xiii chapter texte p sawe beast ryse sea hauing seuen heades ten horne vpon bornes ten crownes vpon heade name blasphemye beaste whiche saw lyke catte mountayne fete fete beare mouth mouth lion dragon gaue power feare great auctorite beast sene ryse vp raging sea worlde signified kingdome rome vnder dominion whiche kingdom christ borne suffred passion vnder kyngdoe also iohn write boke holy gospel kingdom obteyned power dominion ouer many nacions landes ouercame many kinges whiche thinges came passe vertue godlines romaynes knew lord god much lesse honour dyd ascribe wealth good fortune successe victorie vnto true lyuing god vnto false goddes diuerse emperours rome haue set selues also goddes haue suffred oblacions sacrifice made done vnto thus haue blasphemed true god creatour gouernour al thiges whose seruice religio yea temple priesthode sacrifice vtterly abolishe subuert spitefully contemptuously set vp al false religio ydolatrie please people whose pleasure buylded set vp churche pantheon honour sainctes goddes whiche remaineth rome vntil day errours rich blasphemousthe catte vice whole world wer gotten batel like vnto cat mountayne wt many speckle spottes whiche smacke souour draweth many beastes vnto destroieth eue ye romaynes vnder pretece glorious name title haue gotte great power auctoryte wherby haue oppressed hurt whole world much length intollerable beare hath weake heade strog feete signifieth powerthe beare tyrannye weakenes feblenes captaines emperours part haue shamful endes wicked shameful liues spoilful gredy deuour lio power might stregth mighty god yet haue cofessed ascrybed vnto vnto ydolles false goddes vnto lucifer kyng head false goddes whiche named dragon wyll estemed taken lorde worlde also harte vngodly supersticious heathen ydolaters whiche knowe nothing onely true lyuynge god texte p sawe one heedes wounded death deadly wounde healed worlde wondred beaste worshipped dragon whiche gaue power vnto beaste worshipped beaste sayinge lyke vnto beaste able warre empire rome dyd suffer muche beginning ofte tymes feble many tymes deadly sycke meanes daylye continuall vproares sedicions nobilitie common againe kynges bothe muche length made suffered great battels amonge selues vntil dominion laste came one hande thought healed safe againe whole earth vnder honoured serued deuyll false goddes enemy god truth true godlynes vnto goddes dyd ascribe fortune successe power kingdome dyd subiectes lykewyse whiche dyd honour romaynes goddes toke estemed inuincible texte p geuen vn mouthe spake great thinges blasphemyes power geuen vnto two fourtye monethes opened mouthe vnto blasphemye god blaspeme name tabernacle dwell heauen geue vnto make warre sainctes ouercome power geuen ouer kinred tonge nacion dwell vpon earth worshipped whose name wrytten boke lyfe lambe whiche kylled beginning worlde bothe iewes false christian pryde malice obstinacye haue blasphemed persecuted god israell christen faith christe selfe also sauiour worlde deede worde statute lawes great deale ouerlong pilate depute thei put sauiour christ vnto death apostle also vnder regiment iurisdiccion vntill tyme constantyne also iii hundred yeares afterwarde haue xlii monethes iii yeares halfe iii yeares halfe vnderstanded thre hundred yeares halfe whiche time name true god sauiour christ hath bene wonderfully manyfolde wayes blasphemed shamefully dyshonoured moste faithful seruantes minister haue cruelly tormented put painful death throughout whole romishe empire onely true faithes sake onely one god tabernacle say temple ierusalemtabernacle pollute breake downe withall seruice religion god began sore battel persecucio christen faithe al faithful beleuers throughout whole world deputes muche worlde must honour kyngdome dominion rome obedient therunto onely holy electe excepte whiche obserued word god wyll refused ydolatrie therfore great nomber dyd suffer put death texte p man haue eare let heare leadeth captiuite shall goe captiuitie kylleth swearde muste killed swearde pacience faithe sainctes thoughe woulde saye wilt thou heare howe pryde abhominacion tyrannye hath shall haue ende heare one worde howe assirians bybylonians medes grecian ende euen shall rome also lyke hath ouercome robbed spoiled murthered shamed condemned world eue shall serued againe also shall happen vnto doe lyke vnto christ sayde garden therfore angell iohn exhorte christian combred oppressed persecucion selfe also whiche banysshed pathmos condemned domicianus god true faithes sake vnto pacience perfyte faithe god whiche shall geue sende prosperous blissed ende vnto al suche affliccios shal eyther reforme rageing romyshe kingdome el shal vtterly destroye hath done texte p behelde another beast comminge vp earth two horne lyke lambe spake dragon dyd first beast could presence caused earth whiche dwel therin worship first beast whose dedly wounde healed dyd great wonder made fyre come downe heauen syght men deceaued dwelte earthe meanes signes whiche power doe syght beaste saying dwelt earthe shoulde make ymage vnto beaste wounde swearde dyd lyue whan romyshe kyngdome tyme iulyanus began diuided east west diminishe ceason began newe romyshe kingdome iurisdiccion namely pope pompe onely spirituall iurisdiccion dyd first pretende wordes also secular power toke vpon power euen sworde cause beast hath ii horne cause yet wyll named lyke lambe christes deputie vicar wyll haue power christ hathe bothe heauen earthe beastes dragonishe speache maye well estemed taken none bloudye murtheringe suspendynge excommunicatinge banysshinge good emperour grecian dyd take al ymages church also godlye byshoppes grecian woulde haue kepte easter learned saincte iohn apostle dyd angell commaunde hym doe yet worde god onely dragon destroyer kingdome papacie toke vpon power first beast romyshe emperour compelleth christian ydolatrye seruice false goddes vnder priuie colour secret pretece true faithe honour holy sainctes martirs seruauntes christ christ selfe meanes whiche pretence came passe processe tyme men honour worship euen deuyll muche dyd performe obey wyll transgressinge seconde commaundement ymages strange goddes eue muche serue deuil euil wounde healed longe godlye emperour constantine holy bysshoppes throughout whole christendome nowe deuyll bringeth againe churche vnder pretence holines pretence spring departinge faithe decaye loue chronicle testifie wonderfull token haue bene wrought papacie ende christ selfe dyd prophecye longe agoe vnto disciple gaue warning vnto seconde beaste muste ymages made euen accordinge vnto pleasure dragon papacye wyll haue without respecte whether conformable vnto worde god good profitable conscience soule man texte p power geue sprete vnto ymage beast ymage beaste speake cause many woulde worship ymage beaste shoulde kylled made bothe small great riche poore fre bonde receaue marke right handes forheades man might sell saue marke name beaste nomber name wysdome let hath witte counte nomber beaste nomber man nomber syxe hundred three score syxe bringethe dragon passe establyshe confirme worshipping ymages whiche began doe miracle dyd speake great wonder men somtyme helpe nicromancie science deuyll whiche science many came vnto papacye owne story doe testyfie dothe folowe afterwarde whoso euer wyll worship ymage must dye euen papacye wyll haue yet vntyll daye parcialite geue markes excommunicate dysherite kyngdomes heretages suche wyll worshyppe honour ymages must men speake warely circumspectly dysplease man maye enioye lyfe bodye estimacion goodes quietly goddes worde wyll commaundeth otherwyse maner wysdome god willeth beastes nomber errour shoulde haue ende rekenludouicus pius viii hundreth lvi yeare lorde thousande v hundreth xx backewarde nomber vi hundreth iii score vi yeares looke tyme tha pope emperours p xiiii chapter texte p loked lo lambe stoode mount sion hundred xliiii thousande hauing name father name written foreheades heard voyce heauen sounde many water voyce great thounder hearde voyce harper harping harpes foloweth rewarde shall haue whiche folowe notthe lambe horned beast worship lambe vpon mount sion sauiour christ rulinge gouerning holy christen churche sorowing faithful elect great nomber customable vse scripture sygnifieth infinite exceadinge great nomber god elect beginninge worlde vntil ende therof vnknowen vnto whole worlde althoughe nomber wicked damned sorte also great nomber electe whiche without feare shame compulsion haue confessed knowledged honoured spred furth noysed abrode preached taught name heauenly father worlde spyte resistinge deuyll minister wicked worlde texte p song new song seate foure beastes elder man coulde learne song hondred foure fourtye thousande whiche redemed earth whiche defiled wemen virgin folow lambe whither soeuer goeth redemed men beynge first frutes vnto god lambe mouthes founde gyle without spot trone god heauenly voice moost pleasaunt musycke incessaunt continuall endles prayse thankesgeuinge reioysinge mirthe ioye faithfull blissed eternall blisse kingdome god lord sauiour iesus christ syng new song newe benifite grace acte god whiche hathe fulfylled christ tyme conuenient ordeyned appointed thing whiche beginninge worlde promised vnto holy patriarkes olde father loked people nacions beleued vpon vnto saluacion electe whiche redemed deare pryce precious heart bloude christ shed vpon crosse earth electe confessours singer laudes prayses vnto god whiche defyled earthly vnsemely pleasure worlde delighting fleshly lustes filthines right godly christen loue god worde heuely vertues chast thoughtes right godly doctrine ceremony exercyse wherof shoulde haue suffred maner pleasure care loue transitorye thing haue hyndred cannot vnderstanded suche bodily chastitie virginitie religious parson monkes nonnes priestes deacon suche haue pretented falsely made boast vnto world whiche hath founde rare groslye broken negligetly kept wonderfull seldome geuen god vnto vower therof thoughe kept yet profitable necessarye vnto right christen godly relygion god seruice apostle whiche onely praysed commended gospel paule would god lesse suche wylde grosse wanton chastitie virginitie lytle praysed auncient holy father oh wer lykewyse lesse extolled estemed father time seyng hath bene great blot vnto christes true religion might muche said muche lamented lord graunt may sone amended redressed holy frendes god enoche noe abraham isaac iacob iudas ioseph dauid moyses aaron patriarkes prophetes saye yea without doubt peter paule infinite olde holy bysshops also register withal blissed elect pleasaunt acceptable frute vnto lorde desierous mercye grace beloued euerlastinge ordeyned vnto kingdome ioyfull desierous first frutes whiche men doe eate great lust desire appetite highe praise thankes geuynge ought faithe acceptable pleasant god geuen plentifull grace beyng accompanyed true loue hope without decketh hydeth th ir synnes howe many howe great howe greuous euer vnto euyls misfortune euen synnes also maner thinges hapned ended vnto best hapned vnto dauid peter paule marie magdalene vnto al holy sainctes elect sanctified bloude innocent lambe christ sauiour althoughe men
