sainctes synners god yet lambes sake whome truste reputed without spot blame iudgement seate god p sawe another angell flye myddes heauen hauinge euerlastinge gospell preache vnto syt dwell earth nacions kynredes tonges people saying loude voyce feare god geue honoure houre iudgement come worshyp made heauen earth sea fountaines water folowed angell sayinge babilon fallen fallen great citie made nacions drincke wyne fornicacion true faithfull preacher holy gospell ofte called angel maye well whiche kyng christ sendeth manye kingdome heauen accordinge state worlde dyuerse time requireth holy sincere doctrine gospell might sone frutefully flye throughe christen churche whiche thing wicked dragon doth sore ha e greuouslye dyspleased therwith therfore persecuteth muche falsehede great power throughe minister deputy yet notwithstanding gospell god remayneth euerlastinglye churche euen beginninge worlde vntyll ende wherof man worlde excuse selfe voyce trueth therof bothe open cleare god onely lorde must serue trueth innocencye lyfe shewe loue trueth towarde neighbour naturall reason teacheth right pure conscience lyghtned god worde confesse loude voyce gospell soundeth thus feare god godly child doe moost louynge father honour onely grace goodnes come none onely feare iust rightuous iudgement resisted wickednes vngodlines vngraciousnes worship onely inuocacion hath made heaue earth al therin gospell dothe dragon euermore speake first borne eldest sonne antichristes whiche syns caims tyme hath euer continued euen vntyll aduersaries whiche tyme doe openly resist manifest open knowen trueth thincke imagine wyll hinderauce vnto pompe pryde vngodly abhominable lyuinge trueth worde god hindered suppressed soner rather must fall destroyed whiche dragon hath imagined dyuised lambe worde god trueth maner right godlynes well babilonicall confusion maner wycked lawes decree maner falsehede tyrannye holy gospell rightly vnderstande shall beate downe confounde vtterly destroye cursed abhominable babilon mightye strong euer hath bene great whoredome wherof hath made worlde drincke nowe come lyght knowen texte p thirde angell folowed saying loude voyce man worship beast ymage receaue marke forheade hande shall drincke wyne wrathe god whiche powred cuppe wrath shalbe punyshed fire brymstone holy angel lambe smoke tormente ascendeth vp euermore haue rest daye night whiche worshyp beast ymage whosoeuer receaueth print name pacience sainctes heare kepe commaundementes faith iesu foloweth iudgement sentence god whiche worship beast antichrist resisting withstandinge gospell enuye hate lambe wil robbe honour dewe vnto wyll dyffeate christ kingdome whiche god father hath geuen shoulde kynge kynges also euerlasting onely priest immortall whome antichrist ii horne goeth aboute studieth banysshe expell ouerthrowe set selfe vp temple christe churche thoughe christ shoulde nothinge care churche absent forsaken broken promisse thoughe gospell meane antichristes power suche hart rather possessed deuyll pryde infydelitie abhominable presumpcion condemne holy gospel stablyshe set vp al suche thinges maye subuerte ouerthrowe gospell ydolatreous supersticious ymages honoured churche hethenishe ceremony onely inuented pompe couetousnes pleasure pastime bleare deceaue simple geueth vnto sworne champion marke supersticious order wherwith bewitcheth inchanteth wherof neyther peter paule neuer made mencion neuer knewe besydes byndeth wicked othe deuillyshe vowe godlynes confirme stablyshe pompe abhominable pryde heauenly earthlye power institute ordeyned god without maner shame feare al whiche consent vnto damnable beast eyther worship maynteyne shall surely suffer wrathe god whiche alreadye prepared babilonicall cup powred god redye hande wherof shall drincke onely botomles pit hell also euen worlde accordinge effecte doctrine god worde preachinge holy prophetes christ selfe apostle wt muche shame opprobry destruccion possyble haue worlde yf vnrepentant harte shall heape vnto selues treasure wrath god goyng forwarde wickednes without repentaunce neuer returning backe vntil last howre vntyll death possyble damnacion begon worlde myschefe wickednes without sorowe repentance amendment leauynge example vnto posterite committe maynteyne lyke wickednes possible saye smoke payne torment shall ascende vp euerlasting euerlastinge without maner rest daye night dyd euer helpe vnto suche vngodlynes consent vnto opened dore vnto wickednes woulde extolled praysed therfore antichristes marke contrarye holy token god electe whiche haue foreheades namely holy worde god whiche haue suffered muche payne opprobrye excedynge great pacience iesus sake texte p hearde voyce heauen sayinge vnto wryte blessed deed herafter dye lorde euen sayth spirite rest laboures worckes folowe great danger faithful vnder iurisdiccion antichristes abhominacion ii horne vnlawfull vsurped power vpon bodye soule vtterly worde god whiche onely comforte al faithfull soules necessary comforte come vnto heauen aboue whiche lambe sendeth vnto true christian thorowe holy gospell spirite god writeth harte beleue stedfastlye otherwyse worlde whiche wyll folow christ must beare crosse euen vnto death christe innocent lambe dyd afterwardes shall see nothing euerlastinge saluacion merited purchased vnto thorowe passion death christe iustificacion merite eternall saluacion electe whiche comforte shall muche greater soules kynkdome christe possible al merites man deserue obteyne speciallye suche tyme glorified bodye shall ioyned vnited againe vnto blissed soule latter daie therfore good workes faithful thei doe goe faith loue onely frutes euen shall preuent merite christ electe euerlastinge spirit christ saythe folowe come whan haue obteyned rest peace thorowe free grace mercye god thorowe merite christes rightuousnes saye thorowe faithe haue folowed good workes humble obedient heart whiche workes lorde wyl graciouslye crowne gyftes receyue rewarde acceptable vnto texte p loked beholde whyte cloude vpon cloude one syttinge lyke vnto sonne man hauinge heed golden crowne hande sharpe spckle another angell came temple cryinge loude voyce sate cloude christ thy syckle reape tyme come reape corne earthe rype sate cloude thrust syckle earth arth reaped althoughe right faithfull garnyshed good workes worde god euermore sure saluacion yet withstandynge iudgement god whan tyme come goeth forwarde suche thinges set vp worde god readye hande one tyme reason obscuringe blyndinge god worde amonge iewes thorowe cursed talmud wherunto gaue faith credence cleaued earnestly vnto vnto lawe god prophetes lykewyse among christian specially among hyghe bysshops prelate wt glorious tytles pope patriarkes cardinal primate suche order whiche one euer desiered aboue nother sekyng alwayes owne glorye lust pompe honour dignitie wil god faithe godlynes lyfe yet gospell whiche haue alwayes pretended falsely craftilye colour cloke myschefe wickednes concerninge turkes faithe saye lytle greatest faut wickednes beastlynes haue knowledge writinges profe experience feared yf god mercifull vnto v shall learne soner woulde myddest thorowe trompet gospel beyng blowen tyme wonderfull sorte thorowe spirite helyas whiche appeareth commeth abrode plentuouslye effectuouslye rysen daylye ryseth suche mouynge sterringe vp men harte suche knowledge truth lyght lanterne doctrine iudgement antichristes workes suche feare wrathe god good hope holy holsome seede god worde plentiously sowne spred abrode shall returne againe without great frute edif enge faithe lyfe men iewes whether wyll must nedes despaire workinge faithe doctrine state whan see whole kyngdome heauen whiche take peculiarely taken made common vnto feare god thorowe whole worlde euer founde euen also amonge christian doctrine profession holy gospell true faythe godlye vertues shall waxe increase heades ruler christendome shall also ioyfullye receyued true christen subiectes notwithstandynge nomber shall alwayes least also knowledge vnderstandinge lernynge readynge holy scripture shall somwhat increase amonge spirituall prelate shoulde hoped earnest feruent prayer desired called god well thought beleued lord wyll doe parte also euen suche wyse promysed antichrist beyng thus put shame yet remayninge styll impenitent shall reaped downe syckle god worde thorowe spirite helyas shall cut downe thresshed destruccion profyte edificacion saluacio world hath lorde sauiour christ brought passe whiche alwayes heade churche onely present therwith also doth graciouslye rule gouerne edifieth helpeth roteth enemy aduersaries sickle rightuous iudgemente shall vtterly banyshe consume accordinge vnto moost victorious muincible worde texte p another angell came temple heauen hauynge also sharpe syckle another angell came aultar whiche power euer fyre cryed loude crye sharpe sickle sayde thruste thy sharpe sickle gaddre cluster earthe grape rype angel thruste syckle earth cut downe grape vyneyarde earthe caste great wynefat wrath god wynefat troden without cytie bloude came fat euen vnto horse brydels space thousande syce hundred furlonges lyke iudgement antichrist felowship prophecied world spirite helias syckle gospel euen doth spirite god place prophecie iudgement shal happe afterwarde latter daye vnto obstinate impenitent blynde contemners god iudgemet euerlastinge damnacion latter iudgement whiche damnacio hell vnderstande signified great fat god wrathe wicked shall come together one stampe treadinge god iudgement sentence rightuousnes shal euerlastingly trode muche greuouslye tha worldly temporall punishement lyfe heate fyre painefull intollerable vnto bodye man cloudes vnto earthe darkenes vnto eye whiche greuous damnacion destruccio sygnified feareful bloude whiche floweth ouer earth horse treade therin euen vnto brydles thus vseth holy scripture descrybe paynt greuous terryble iudgement god suche greate vgsome terryble figure p xv chapter texte p sawe another sygne heauen great maruellous seuen angel hauynge seuen last plage fulfylled wrathe god saw glassy see myngled fyre gotten victorye beaste ymage marke nomber name stande glassye sea hauynge harpes god songe song moses seruaunt god songe lambe sayinge greate maruellous thy workes lorde god almightye iuste true thy wayes thou kyng sainctes shall feare lorde glorifie thy name thou onely art holy al gentile shal come worship thee thy iudgementes made manifest nother prophecye holy apostle iohn reueled opened vnto god wyt reason man al worldly power diuises ymaginacions hinderance enemyes wicked gospell shall ryse vp dominion romaynes thorowe dysciples christ thorow holy goost thorowe wonderfull meruelous power god also many heuy plage shall come vpon wicked vngodlye people vpon myghtie ruler worlde whiche studye go hynder procedynge gospell plage rekened one nother thorowe vii angel vii vyalles sea glasse myxed fyre sygnifieth wickednes worlde al wicked enemyes aduersaries trueth doctrine gospell christen innocent conuersacion godlye liuynge whiche enemyes tymes worlde specially first beginnynge springynge vp gospell christen religion holy electe fayne lye felde warre iewes miracle heathen holy scripture suttell philosopher worldlye wyse men faythe gospel teacheth innocent godly lyfe tyrannes violence romaine pacience ydolatrye false seruice god stedfast constantnes euen vnto death cleauynge vnto vnderstandynge sentence trueth thus thorowe power christ thorowe spirite helias haue gone thorowe gotten victorye olde dragon wicked spirites vnfaythfull whole worlde al nacions laude honoure triumphe victorie ascribed creature onely christ whiche alone ouercome wickednes worlde lye falsehede deuyll infidel spyte tyrannye therfore moyses dyd synge song prayse thankes geuynge destruccion pharao ioyfull victorye child israell euen also dyd synge vnto song lambe whiche belongeth dewe vnto onely sayinge god worcke whiche almightye hathe wonderfullye graciously wrought v owne glorious sake whiche rightuous iudgementes true promyses whose wayes iudgement grace rightuousnes trueth whiche onely preserueth faithfull electe puyssaunt mighty lorde faithfull louynge father whome men ought feare suche reuerence godly childre geue vnto father hartye obedience wyse wicked whiche lyke vnfaithfull contemptuous child doe despyse contemne omnipotent almightye god father rightuous lorde iudge whiche knoweth thinges therfore praysed highly exalted congregacion faithfull euerlastingly hated cursed wicked damned sort vtter eternal damnacion man hynder auoyde howe strong mightye euer emperour rome domicianus nero al nacions shal heare beleue receyue holy gospel whan tyme one come shall honour worship onely eternall almightie god messias promysed vnto sauiour whole worlde redemer faithfull electe texte p loked beholde temple tabernacle testimony ope heauen seuen angel came temple whiche seuen plage clothed pure bright lynnen hauynge brestes girded golden girdels one foure beastes gaue vnto seuen angel seuen golden vyalles full wrath god whiche lyueth euermore temple full smoke glorye god power man able enter temple til seuen plage seuen angel fulfylled nowe gospell come abrode worlde thorowe christ apostle synguler profite faithfull elect saluacion soules euen stomblynge stone offence codemnacion hurte losse vnto wicked speciallye vnto kyngdome dominion rome long space whiche hath resisted force dyuerse assaultes body goodes possession true faith cruel tyranny whiche almightye rightuous god tyme hath alwayes taken hande punyshe greuouslye hath brought also passe openynge tabernacle testimonye manifest fulfillynge newe testament mystery secretes whiche hydden sygnified olde testament vnder diuerse ceremony seuen angel whiche came temple multitude minister preacher gospell serueth vnto wicked increase augmentacio damnacion whiche cause maye called plage christ called simeon fall comforte saluacion vnto electe angel euangelical preacher must pure al conuersacion must haue breastes girded faith loue harte soule mynde garnysshed godly vertues one angel dothe christ geue thorowe iiii beastes also sygnified iiii chapter power bringe furthe publyshe abrode gospell whiche maye signified vyals full wrathe god wicked vnfaithfull full grace mercye vnto faithfull whiche abyde suffer bothe payne ioye welth woe thus temple god christen churche fylled swete smellinge smoke prayse honour goodnes god truly confessing knowledginge power might god churche christ coulde rest coulde quietly prosper vntyl vii plage came forthe plage gospel beyng preached minister god wherof great multitude sent god occasion p xvi chapter texte p hearde great voyce temple saying seuen angel go wayes poure vyalles wrathe vpon earthe first angell went powred vyalle vpon earth fel noysome sore otche vpon men marke beaste vpon worshipped ymage seconde angell shed vyalle vpon see turned bloude dead man euery lyuinge thing died see thirde angell shed vyalle vpo riuers fountaynes water turned bloude hearde angell saye lorde whiche art wast thou art righteous holy thou hast geuen suche iudgementes shed bloude sainctes prophetes therfore hast thou geuen bloude drincke worthye hearde another aultar saye euen lorde god almightie true righteous thy iudgementes mercye god vouchsaued preserue augment prosper regiment romaynes beginninge whiche whan quietnes tyme come christe shoulde borne god offered grace vnto kyngdome sent holy gospell thorowe holy apostle synguler welth profyte bothe kyngdome also whole earth world might lerne peace loue humilitie pacience gentilnes temperance true vertues speciallye faithe one onely god hope saluacion tyme come also true christen loue one another dothe gospel writynges apostle exhort moue men vnto mooste earnestly holy profytable doctrine inuincible trueth hath dragon alwayes withstanden resysted beast empire regiment rome first seconde wherof spoken cause kingdom hath wel deserued many diuerse punishementes whiche lorde god hath permitted thorow minister rightuousnes whiche vnderstande place angel vial full plage whiche come fallen vpon dysobediente contemners despysers faithe loue trueth firstethis name nowe turned called al sainctes plage fallen vpon ydols false goddes whiche set packed together one tempel pantheon saye goddes ydolatrye false goddes subuerted ouer throwen thorowe whole empire rome thorowe holy gospel chronicle doe euidently testifye thus dyd religion god seruice romaynes first fele wrathe god againste wylles hapned vnto faithfull best honour glorye god furtheraunce profyte christen churche congregacion seconde plage seconde angell seconde iudgement god againste regiment rome imbeselynge diminyshe power dominion many landes people fallynge muche bloude sheddynge romaynes playnely mencioned story nero domicianus iulianus dyuerse thirde plage maye vnderstande destruccion citie rome thorow gothes wandales enemyes romaynes maner lettes hynderaunce neyther hylles dale see water neyther host power men yet strength keping city plage romaine al story make mencion large bloody kyngdom rome end whiche cause angel crieth iustly lorde thou art rightuouse c angell water may taken angell god whiche gather together suche great multitude people came altogether kyngdom long plaged al people shed muche holy martirs bloode true christe faithes sake must nedes reueged therfore rightuous manifest iudgement god praysed againe seconde tyme preached goddes angel highe thanckes geuynge texte p fourthe angell powred vyall sunne power geuen vnto vexe men heate fyre men raged great heate spake euyll name god whiche hath power ouer plage repented geue glorye fyfte angell powred vyalle vpon seate beast kyngdome wexed derke gnewe tonges sorowe blasphemed god heauen sorowe payne sore repented dedes fourthe plage went ouer seconde regiment rome whiche temporal spiritual gouernance twise worse first muche thorow ii horne power bothe ouer bodye soule ouer doctrine ouer polytike lawes mouthe hande againste god also temporall gouernaunce christe minister howe hath dealte emperours rule haue kepte amonge selues one romyshe pope another practising wicked science deuil bothe quicke also deade many good godly kynges emperours againe ofte rome papacye hath bene greuously plaged god rebellyon treason murther poysonynge nigromancye suche kindes wickednes neuer herde storyes maye reade storyes pope emperours time charles great vntyll late dayes meanes summe christen vertue godlynes turned desceite fraude falsehede hipocrisie moste parte wicked pope religious men mooste false traytours gospell christe repentaunce none founde deuilyshe flocke fyfte angell fyfte plage fallen vpon seate pestilence rebellyon resistance gospell raysed vp thorow false teacher whiche haue preached bothe without also holy lawe scripture lorde haue rayled many godly faithfull men leauynge refusynge holy scripture settynge vp studye aristotle steade therof whiche papacye hath bene regarded estemed holy worde god meanes wherof many greuous errours crepte churche well matter faythe relygion dyscipline christen behauour muche deuision many sectes meanes many order religion many glorious name tytles yea heresyes also al story full emperour fryderiche first name vntyl ende thirde frydierche whiche tyme muche trouble raysed vp christendome seculer iurisdiccion thorowe turke spirituall thorowe beggyng order religious parson hyghe heathnyshe scholes vniuersities time muche might wrytten heuy inoughe red auoyde tediousnes vnto reader shall intermitted tyme texte p syxte angell poured vyall vpon great ryuer euphrates water dryed vp wayes kynges east shoulde prepared saw thre vncleane spirites lyke frogges come mouthe dragon mouthe beast mouthe false prophet spirites deuyls workynge miracle go vnto kynges earthe whole worlde gather batayle great daye god almighty beholde come thefe happie watcheth kepeth garmentes lest walke naked men see fylthines gathered together place called hebrue tonge armagedon consyder waye yf angell maye sygnifye spirite helias oure tyme whiche spreedeth abrode gospell worlde bothe worde dede confusion vtter destruccion errours profyte reformacion worlde state degree seede brynge forthe nother frute great euphrates pretensed spiritualtye sore falle first rule become worldly secular secular state muche vtterly dryed vp wythered gospel syncerely preached merueyled euen necessitie falsehede deceyte lye hypocrisye must opened dysclosed trueth god word preachinge gospell syncere loue trueth faythe worde god sure confydence harte lorde god myght taught prynted naturall wyt vnderstandinge man therfore necessarie suche wrestynge true knowledge doctrine shoulde dysclosed vnto suche haue vnderstandynge vtterly corrupte euen vnto worldlye prince hygher power innocencye clearnes also synguler profyte doctrine gospell might come lyght myght see confesse trueth acknowledge imbrace sunne rysinge vp althoughe doctrine stronge bloude fleshe beyng fleshlye ouer weake strengthe lyue gospell nowe euangelicall sunne manyfest knowledge trueth shall aryse iii maner enemyes whiche shall assaulte first deuyllyshe dragon great enemye god goodnes botomles pyt wyckednesse whome mercye goodnes god dalyeth playeth shewe declare mercye goodnes manifestlye men seconde beaste rome whome spake right antichrist whiche speaketh worketh gospell iesus christe wherunto preferreth decretalles wyll lorde ouer scripture ouer churche ouer whole world yet wyll taken estemed vycar debyte christ peter frende holy father head whole holy christendome whosoeuer contraryeth gainesayth must dye also cursed made deuylles power beastes mouthe thirde false prophete one person whole order multitude byshops relygions parson monckes frier c whiche office callynge ought mainteine supporte true doctrine haue appoynted bent selues whole lyfe state vtterly doctrine gospel nothing vnlike state apostle eyther doctrine religion lyfe order state wherof nedefull make manye wordes howe haue alwayes resisted doctrine gospell suche iii foule vncleane spirites none founde vncleane whiche notwithstandynge doe worke great token miracle deuyll great wonder bothe amonge turkes christian papacy forcerye witchcrafte nigromancie monkes religious spirituall sorte withall suttyltie falsede crafte suche miracle haue ben done wherby hath ben euident inoughe haue begyled bothe riche kinges prince whole world good possession thorow false doctrine fight kepe batel alwayes holy gospel gog magog ierusalem dyuerse victory triumphes shal ouercome length thorowe power god worde gospell reueled come light thorowe spirite enoche helyas whiche mencioned great daye god almighty shall come suche tyme man ware whan men thincke sure eue suche tyme wickednes iii spirites shal strong highest shall godly minister gospel indewed strengthned spirite helias ioyfully come furthe deuils al maner errours bothe faith outwarde lyfe shall happye whiche watche careful great diligence christen doctrine religion whiche clothed power holy goost right zeale whiche set furthe workes god dyd helyas onely wordes wrytinges also lyfe deedes example continuaunce constantnes goodnes without pryde desyre vayne glorye man shall euer see shame iudgemet god hath gathered iii vncleane spirites one place eternall fyre damnacion euerlastinge shame payne confusion whiche prepared promysed deuyll angel harmagdon maye sygnifye muche iudgement curse texte p seuenth angel powred vyalle ayre came voyce heauen seate sayinge done folowed voyces thonderynges lightninges great earthquake suche sence men vpo earth mightye earthquake great great citie deuyded thre party cyties al nacions fell great babilo came remembraunce god geue vnto cuppe wyne featcenes wrathe euery yle also fled awaye mountaynes founde f great hayle bene talentes heauen vpon men men blasphemed god plage hayle great plage sore seuenth angell harde vncerten interprete expounde lyke vncerten wryte thinges come suche thinges alredy past may wel great feare tyme come kyngdom turkes short space shal great plage sorow heuy iudgemet ouer corrupte decayed christedome whiche plage may founde marked wordes shal happe come passe suche tyme lambe minister shal rule vpon earth iewes heathen shal conuerted vnto christ may sayde al done vp full end worlde come terrible iudgement god fal vpo one sorte parte men whiche shall lyue whiche first parte part whiche shall ryse vp vnto euerlastynge saluacion thirde already damned shalbe greatest part vnto iudgemet shal goe come shal fearful terrible tha hart thincke toung expresse terrible heuy thing sygnified muche possyble terryble voyces thonders lightninges earthquake ouerthrowing greatest mightiest city kingdomes babilo rome thing thought ymagined terrible fearfull whiche thing cursed damnable worlde shall muste suffer rightuous iudgemente god muste fele great wrathe god forasmuche hath alwayes despised blessed gospel christ sauiour redemer therfore great heauye stroke plage god rightuous iudgement shal fal vpon worlde yet shall amende damned parson shall cast set euerlastinge blasphemye god wherin hardened wil amende whiche highest greatest plage lorde god maye wil sende vpon enemy p xvii chapter texte p came one seuen angel seuen vialles talked saying vnto come wil shewe thee iudgement great whore sytteth vpon many water whome haue committed fornicacion kynges earthe inhabiters earth droncken wyne fornicacion spirit caried away wildernes saw woman syt vpon rose coloured beast full name blasphemye whiche seuen heades ten horne woman arayed purple rose coloure decked golde precious stone perles cup golde hande full abhominacions fylthines fornicacion forheade name wrytten mistery great babilon mother whordome abhominacions earth saw wyfe droncken bloude sainctes bloude witness iesu sawe wondred great marueyle one seuen angel whiche spake seconde kyngdome iurisdiccion rome beast ii horne commeth againe wyll speake largely sufficiently antichrist whiche chiefe pricke marke wherat wil shote nameth wt new name great whore whiche wil head chiefe gouernour many nacios whose special abiding lande named italy lieth see maner lesser asia dothe pompous suttil deceightfull shameles lecherous proude state papacy haue kinges comitted whordo almost thousade yeares beyng sometyme frendes together sometyme enemyes sometyme one chiefe fauour sometyme another thus haue christen kyngdoms suffred selues ruled ledde yea put feare againe co forte ioy suspendinge cursynge vntyll crepte farre churche god became highest desolacion decaye therof euer woman vpon rose coloured beast onely arayed red scarlet robe lyke cardinales otherwyse euer christ humble apostle bysshops spirituall minister like bloud thurstye soudyers rather muche christen bloude sheddynge vnder pretence punyshement heresy must named hath bene spoken written pompe vsurped power tyranny papacye woman also arrayed suche infinite variable colour ornamentes monkery dyuerse lyueres religious order whome would haue honour profyte whiche name sectes haue obscured blemysshed name christ wherof paule doth complayne chorinthians vnsemynge thinge dede great blasphemye name benet austen saincte fraunces shoulde obscure name honour christ onely sauiour redemer woman besyde variable garmentes hath also taken vpon set furth pryde dignite estimacion withall rule ouer christen kynges prince whiche hath brought vnder made subiect contributorye vnto falsehede lye vtterly doctrine holy gospell vox autem nonsic shall yee also example christes fetewasshynge lykewyse holy order commendacion saincte peter whiche neyther golde syluer order holy apostle saincte paule whiche auoyde offence ope gospell woulde erne breade handes apostle also dyd whoryshe woman hath garnished decked selfe farre otherwyse diuerse many vertues precious stone golde siluer c cuppe golde loue christ christen faith lawe god muche rather pope decree decretalles bulles patentes dyspensacions suspension cursynges abhominacion whordome might playe whore pleasure fasshion pompe aucthorite lust without shame feare beyonde measure vnder name pretence christ holynes honour god welth soule whiche thorow longer vnblessed vnhappye therfore name christen churche hath deserued nother name called worthylye whore babilon mother abhominacion ydolatrye fallyng vnto hethenyshe supersticions innocent bloude holy godly prophetes preacher whiche right christen churche hath neuer l cked hath whore proude glorious papacye shed without nomber measure tyll dronken therwith toke estemed suche tyrannye godlye zeale feruencye hathe perswaded selfe men must suffer content therwith soeuer dyd yea althoughe shoulde sende faithfull soules vnto hell heapes great meruell vnto men vnderstanding offence slander vnto al vnfaithful turkes iewes intollerable violence oppressio vnto whole world wyll say euen vnto inhabitours rome right faithfull harte texte p angel sayde vnto wherfore merueylest thou wyl shewe thee mystery woman beast beareth hath seuen heades ten horne beast thou seest shal ascende botomles pit shal go perdicion dwell earth shall wonder whose name written boke lyfe begynnynge worlde beholde beaste mynde hath wysdome exposicion declaracion good christen reader hast thou comfort woman cursed damnable papacie shall haue ende worlde wherin antichrist shal haue place long worlde shal co tinue endure harte conscieces faithful christianes state degree whiche shall withstande reproue shall hynder let presumpcion feare thonderboltes neyther regarde esteme suspencions cursynges take power auctorite hande beast whiche beareth whiche signifieth romyshe prescripcions papall seate indulgence pardo excommunicacion shall taken estemed knowen vnto worlde holy manifest gospell therfore shall cease persecute helpe suche kynges good vertuous selfe shal couet alwayes clyme vp hygher hygher vntyll length shall fall downe euerlasting perdicion god worlde whiche shall wonder therat speciallye wycked vngodlye whiche electe vnto saluacion whiche pleasure delyght suche pompe pryde dygnite tyrannye abhominacion dyd vse shall wonder meruell saye whan shall see papacy throwen downe heauen damnacion pit hell lyke hapned vnto father great dragon deuyl luke x knowledge iudgement god trueth gospell whiche teacheth v knowe bothe christ antichrist syngular wysedome great gyfte god texte p seuen heades seuen mountaynes whiche woman sytteth also seuen kynges fyue fallen one another yet come commeth must continue short space beaste euen eight one seuen shall go destruccion ten horne whiche thou sawest ten kynges whiche hath receaued kyngdome yet shal receyue power kynges one houre beaste haue one mynde shall geue power strength vnto beaste shal fyght lambe lambe shal ouercome lord lordes kynge kynges side called chosen faithfull vision seuen hylles agreeth well vnto seuen hylles whiche citie rome whiche hath made boast triumph hath also done seuen heade church howe many kingdom wherupon hath sytten appeareth chronicle whiche fallen forsake see daylye shall come remayne shorte space parauenture shall kynge turkes whose infidelite tyrannye maye soner reformed mollyfied altered man iudgemente gospel instruccion god word may soner brought vnto religion true faith christ proud seate rome adherentes thus may eight beast papacie see rome seuenth shal sone iudged vnto damnacion x kynges receyue kyngdome god vntil receyue gospel christ antichrist spirite christe meane tyme shall receyue power aucthorite beast whiche power shall exercyse practyse ouercome lambe oppresse gospell pleasure ii horned beast lambe worde god reuelacion holy godly doctrine truth grace god lorde christ shall ouercome shall vnderstade beleue lorde al lordes kyng al kynges whose kyngdome electe called god euerlastinge doe apperteine thus shal x kynges shortly hate whore wt court shal turne naked florishyng bewtifull rayment wherwith auncientries haue garnished annowrned whore harlottes meanes haue geue occasio vnto suche pryde vnchristen pompe might wel say vnto suche luciferyshe pryde muche wyl like equall vnto christ brydegrome holy churche hath geuen great offence slander vnto holy churche maner hathe shamed oppressed thorowe tyrannye muche kynges prince selues must cfoesse grauntes whiche whore receyued emperours constantine charles lewes beyng deceyued poyson confusion christen churche hatred enuye suche whore shall spirite helias styre vp harte kynges doe one accorde trueth beyng knowen shall require dyd indewe suche power thus shall worde god fulfylled woman great citye hath exalted himselfe byshop ouer byshops regent lorde ouer emperours kynges sittinge also place seate christ whiche onely alone hath receyued power father ouer heauen earth whiche neuer gaue vnto written et gloriam mea alterinon dabo wyll geue gloto nother esaye xlii p xviii chapter texte p sawe another angell come heauen hauynge greate power earth lyghtened britnesse cried mightely stronge voyce sayinge great babilon fallen fallen become inhabitacion deuils holde foule spirites cage vncleane hateful byrdes al nacios haue droncken wyne wrathe fornicacion kynges earthe haue committed fornicacion marchauntes earthe wexed riche aboundaunce pleasure chapter maye taken songe triumphe al faithfull tyrannous kyngdoms haue contemned faithe trueth religion godlynes woulde abyde speciallye kyngdome power rome reason tyrannes whiche beginninge haue martired tormented murthered holy professours onely one god mo principally seconde regyment rome whiche vnder pretence name christe hath dealte cruellye faithful christianes euangelical kingdom god former chapter nexte goyng wel vnderstade great difficultnes hardnes chapter exposicion declaracion former christ angell great councel lyke first comynge came moost highest humilitie lowlynes became man suffered dyed euen last commynge shal come bright glorye virgin bodye whole worlde mooste hyghe brightnesse proclamynge gospell vnto whole worlde riche poore wyse symple euyll ioyfull gospell babylon great worishe citie fallen fallen hathe suche honour wyll take vpon hath done nowe knowen hath bene habitacion wicked vnfaithful desceightfull sodomite whiche haue made worlde druncken mad poyson infectuous drincke hath committed simony withal spirituall thinges whiche euen cursed simon magus dyd hath solde muche monye great rich hyghe humilitie lowlynes christ whose meryte hath pretended owne hath chopped changed yea hath solde princely lordly honour exhibite done vnto feete moost deuely pryde receyued texte p hearde another voyce heauen saye come waye people ye partaker synnes ye receaue plage synnes gone vp heauen god hath remembred wickednes rewarde euen rewarded geue double accordynge workes poure double cuppe whiche fylled vnto asmuche glorified selfe lyued wantonly somuche poure ye punysshment sorowe sayde selfe syt beynge quene wyddowe shal see sorowe therfore shal plage come one day death sorow honger shalbe brente fyre stronge lorde god whiche shall iudge wordes speaketh christ thorowe spirite heauen vnto people shoulde forsake companye felowshyp antichriste make selues partaker horrible synne double indignacion also plage whiche shall lighten vpon synne greater goddes rightuousnes coulde suffer longer vnpunisshed therfore wyll recompence punishment hath deserued heapes one nothers necke woulde long sufferyng god warninge word god helpe thus hapneth vnto vyolent tyrannous kyngdoms euen assirians vnto last romaynes great pryde pompe must subdued vanquysshed great shame bondage prophecye lyke vnto holy prophetes esay daniel although perteineth vnto nother kingdom lyke vnto bothe wickednes punishment texte p kynges earthe shal bewope wayle ouer haue committed fornicacion haue lyued want onlye shall se smoke burnynge shall stande farte feare punishmet saying ala ala great citie babilo mighty citie one houre thy iudgemet come merchauntes earth shal wepe wayle selues man wyll bye theyr ware ware golde syluer precious stone nether pearle raynes purple skarlet al thynne wod al maner vessel yuery maner vessel moost precious wod e brasse yron synamon odoures oyntmentes franckynsence wyne oyle fyne ou e wheate beastes shepe horsses charettes bodyes soules men babylon haue prince prelate yea whole kyngdoms co mitted whordome hathe receyued geuen yea hathe set worldly gayne honour sake without respect rightuousnes onely money brybes neuer founde shamefull marchandyse whiche pope courte specially curtysans haue exercysed many yeares mennes goodes wt nothing el leade syluer parchement byshoprikes sellyng pallium robe whiche shoulde spirituall iurisdiccio first frutes c yea ende suche marchaundyse lyke texte thinges named whiche pryce pope churche nothinge mony muche water salte see oyle breade creame c must serue holynes maintenaunce couetousnes spiritualtye shorte reade onely boke called pope fayre marchandyse well descrybed proued customes lawes romaynes texte p apple thy soule lusted departed al thinges de tie pryce departed thou shalte fynde nomore ch aun e thinges whiche wexed ryche shall stande farre feare punishment wepinge waylinge saying ala ala great cytie clothed raines purple scarlet decked w golde precious stone pearles one houre great rich come naught first muche holynes muche good example doctrine holy churche rome paule testifieth epistle romaynes many holy byshops martirs loued trueth vnto whome gospell synguler ioy delyght comforte glorye processe tyme turned vpsyde downe nothing lefte ruler heades churche onely name churche al perfyght godlye holy lost gone length marchandyse whiche inuented woulde estemed amonge true godly christianes haue inoughe thinges whiche marchauntes doe promyse grace mercye god word therfore romanystes doe meruell frete againste gospel bringeth nother ware olde ware saye humylite lowlynes pouertye sorowe contempte whiche men doe flee abhorte maketh ende also worldlye pompe honour ioy pleasure ydlenes wantonnes outwarde glorious supersticous wil bryng profyte aduantage precious garmentes perles wyll become professours gospell coules shauen crounes wyll longer taken holynes haue vnderstandynge knowledge peter iohn apostolicall minister christ wyll contemne despyse golde syluer christ hath taught faith loue truth pouertye lowlynes texte p euery shyppe gouerner occupyed shyppes shypmen whiche worke see stode farre cryed sawe smoke burnynge sayinge citie lyke vnto great citie ast dust heades cryed wepynge waylynge sayde ala ala tha great citye wherin made riche shyppes see reason costlynes one oure made desolate reioyce ouer thou heauen ye holy apostle prophetes god hath geuen iudgement vpon thus dothe lorde god shewe aduenge selfe violent tyrannous pryde presumpcion whiche perswade selues god el hath care thinges vpon earth wheras euident manifest god worde hathe alwayes bene ende proude presumptuous kyngdoms whiche spiritualtye best haue knowen haue taught also speciallye hath woulde haue suche byshoprike woulde also kepe vntyll shoulde peryshe together hathe ordered selfe therin wil god right rule square god worde holy scripture hath done thinge offyce vocacion hath required ought haue done euident vnto men haue desyred studyed onely haue great power dominion vpon whole earth nacions yles onely honour gayne small studye dilygence rule worlde well godlye god honour saluacion soule onely cause doeth worlde wonder suche great horrible fall seke study dignite honour auctorite worldly lucre tremble feare mourne bewayle heuy iudgement god worldly hynderance holy faithfull whiche onely vpon earth regarde seke honour glorye god whiche doe chefely desyre also heauen whiche haue fruicion perfyght syght knowledge rightuousnes god prayse god hartely rightuous iudgement whiche reueled vnto worlde texte p mightie angell toke vp stone lyke great milstone cast see sayinge suche violence shall great citye babilon cast shalbe founde voyce harper musicions pypers tromperters shalbe hearde craftes man whatsoeuer crafte shal founde sounde myll shalbe hearde voyce brydgrome bryde shalbe hearde thy marchauntes great men earth thyne ch auntment deceaued al ancions founde bloude prophetes sainctes wer slayne vpon earthe suche nother thing dyd ieremy also prophecye kingdome babilo euen prophecied came passe euen doubtles shall lykewyse come passe vnto proude presumpcion lykewyse vnto vngodly tyrantes whether spiritualtye temporaltie heuy greuous iudgement shall take ouerthrowe mightye worlde whiche mysuse power might yea shall vtterly fall decaye ioy lust pryde tyrannye whiche haue vsed tyme gouernaunce specially spirituall minister god whiche office vocacions sake ought haue done taught otherwyse lykewyse suche handy craftes haue serued ydols ydolatrie maynteined false goddes false goddes seruyce inuented onely lucre godlynes shall also haue ende lykewyse ydel priestes suche depende vpon vnprofytable kynde people al suche thinges haue ministred occasion vnto worldly lustes pleasure delyciousnes shall haue lyke end fall tyrus babilon nynyue whiche prophetes make mencion rome romyshe empire also muche shall happen lykewyse vnto papacye courte rome prelate whiche ought spiritual also name selues dede carnall worldly godly men haue bene destroyed truthes sake councels rome euydent neadeth rehersed p xix chapter texte p herde voyce muche people heauen sayinge alleluya saluacion glorye honour power ascribed lorde god true righteous iudgementes hath iudged great whore whiche dyd corrupte earth fornicacion hath auenged bloude seruauntes hande againe sayde alleluia smoke rose vp euermore xxiiii elder foure beastes fell downe worshypped god sate seate sayinge amen alleluya voyce came seare sayinge prayse lorde god ye seruauntes ye feare bothe small great man might say dothe punishment wicked tyrantes damnacion helpe profyte godlye faithfull christian whiche persecuted dragon beast false prophetes true faithe religion sake euen vnto deathe hete place sufficient perfight answer vnto question thus sayde godly minister faithfull witness christe crucified slaine lambe doe nothynge el heauen immortall soules synge thankes laudes vnto god almightie styrring prouokyng exhortynge one nother lyke affeccion zeale prayse god alleluia nothinge el prayse god allelu muche saye prayse ye ya one name lorde god wherby named whiche name dyuerse nowe maye learne maner wordes shoulde shall prayse god bothe also heauen namely thus saluacion goodnes whiche may profitable vnto v maye desyred god againe laude prayse al maner benefites goodnes perteyneth onely vnto mooste mercyfull eternall almightye onely one god must ascribed vnto honour whiche profession declaracion al vertue godly kindnes loue al mighte power omnipotencye due onely vnto true onely eternall god creatour maker creature workes iudgemetes right commendable holy true without maner parcialitye specially much hathe subdued brought downe glorious proude tyrantes bothe spiritualtie temporaltie hath sent eternall damnacion hathe caused wickednes abhominacion also come lyght worlde synguler comforte faithfull electe oppressed thus cease gyue lawdes thanckes vnto god saying continually alleluia smoke true oblacion right sacrifice whiche holy sainctes doe offer heauen euerlastinglye performe also vpon earthe holy churche euen vntyll latter daye meane geuynge thanckes acknowledging goodnes god sayd oblacio sacrifice made cotinually without ceasynge infynite vnspeakeable ioy al holy patriarkes prophetes apostle mattirs whole heauenly felowship whiche euer beginning haue pleased lord god faith loue hope obedience maner ceremony wordes reuerence ioy whiche holy faithfull electe vse dothe holy scripture describe maner capacite men suche wyse may best vnderstande perceyued v amen muche god trueth faithful keping promise wordes maye learne shoulde name esteme holy faithfull saintes prince ruler heaue muche name selues seruantes god better also merite deserte onely grace eleccion god also also greater higher abraham parauenture isaac ioseph simeon peter philip ought curiously serched man heauen shall see knowe perfitely cause occasion iudgement god lyfe texte p hearde voyce muche people euen voyce many water voyce stronge tho dringes saying alleluia lorde god omnipotent raigneth let v glad reioyce geue honour mariage lambe come wyfe made selfe readye graunted rayed wt pure goodly raynes raynes rightewesnes saintes said vnto write happy called vnto lambes supper said vnto true sayinges god tell fete worship said vnto se thou thy felow seruaunt one thy brother euen haue testimony iesus whorship god testimonye iesus spirite prophecye maye vnderstande holy faithful saintes vpon earth whiche manifest ioyfull preachinge gospell muche possible whole world whan iewes turkes shal become christen shal prayse thancke almighty god suche syngular grace mercie hath hitherto bene hindered kept downe force violence antichrist tha shal glory prayse god increase christen churche kingdome christ thorow gospell promysed vnto christ bridegrome church faithful deare beloued spouse world loueth honoureth christ muche shall fylled satisfied goodnes eternall blisse saluacion sylken aray innocency lyfe world thorow grace christ heauen immortal glorificacion body soule shall man right blissed wha shal fully satisfied god thorow christ aboundace plentuousnes benefites goodnes desiered wyshed euerlasting supper mariage christ wherwith christ shal honour electe make blissed al whiche iohn seeth vision said also vnto al thinges vision reuelacions came vnto god honour god whiche true faithfull minister al diligence iohn would haue worshipped parson angel whiche spake vnto angel would wyse suffer like saint neither heaue earth wil suffer thig take vpo yet good worth god onely must worshipped fro whoe onely al goodnes commeth must desired looked onely angel wil take estemed nothig el brethre fredes felow seruautes onely one comon general lord felowes withal beleue christ ready sake vnto al goodnes suffer al maner thiges eue vnto death right perfyte sure wysedome worldly wyse doe knowe neyther desyre regarde texte p sawe heauen open beholde white horse sat vpon hym called faythfull true ryghteousnesse dyd iudge make barrell eye frame fire head many crownes name written noman knew himselfe clothed vesture dypt bloude name called worde god warriers whiche heauen folowed vpon whyte horse clothed white pure raynes mouth went sharpe two edged swerde smyte hethen shall rule rodde yron trode wynefat fearsnes wrathe almightie god hath vesture thighe name writte king kinges lorde lordes spirite god must speake men maner men yf vnderstande therfore describeth maiestie christ euen maiestie emperour highe power wont honoured euen christ described honour laude name word god wherwith iohn beginneth gospel wherby thinges made whiche also god manne obiecte faith saye thing wherunto faith al electe hath respecte also rightuous iudge ouer euer heauen earth whiche hath fyerye burning zeale hate wicked whiche contemne despyse worde crowneth godly faithfull crowne rightuousnes name vnknowen vnto world trueth wherof would expresse pilate yet trueth god worde one thing rightuousnes christ signified sworde althoughe worde god also doth perce thorowe inwarde harte mynde faithfull written iiii hebrues sworde taken rightuousnes god kyngdome wherwith christ ruleth kingdom whych hys father hath geuen hym herytage dauid sayth like hath ioy euerlastynge blisse wariers hoost folowe euen doth presse treade downe wicked eternall damnacion whome also trode presse vntil vesture blody toke mocke folyshe yes vnto iewes slander yet knee must bowe vnto onely angel men heaue earth also hell shall troden wrathe god almightie without dout king kynges lorde lordes texte p sawe angel stande soche sonne cryed loude voyce saying foules flye myddes heauen come gather selues together vnto supper great god ye maye eate fleshe kynges fleshe ye captaines fleshe mightie men fleshe horse syt fleshe fre bonde men small great sawe beast kinges earth warriers gathered together make batayle sat horse souldiers beast taken false prophet wrought miracle whiche deceaued receaued beastes marke worshipped ymage bothe cast ponde fire burnynge brimstone remnaunt wer slayne swearde sat vpon horse whiche swearde proceaded mouthe foules fulfylled fleshe lyke chryst maketh supper vnto hys chyldren seruauntes heauen euen doth also beynge sonne ryghtuousnes make supper vnto deuylles al dampned sowles euerlasting supper al bitternes vnblessydnes wherof maye eate partaker altogether desperacion hate enuye wrathe murmuringe againste god kyndes euil whiche sygnified corporall thinges accordynge capacite suche wyse men maye moued therby must necessitie marke consyder noted iohn seeth gestes deuell hell destr yers worlde tyrantes maner degree beast ii horne dragon false prophete enemyes god trueth religion maner godlynes oppressours innocent frendes god shorte whiche beare marke token dragon beast whiche infidelyte misbelefe christ lyke faith crucified christ sure marke token al electe vnfaithfull must lyue eternally ponde fyre shall ponisshed vexed painfully vnspeakeable sorowe heuines euen deuel seruates together although come life sworde without faith yet damnacio begin shal continue euerlastingly p xx chapter texte p sawe angell come downe heauen hauynge kaye bottomlesse pit great chayne hande toke dragon olde serpent whiche deuil satanas bounde thousande yeares cast bottomlesse pit bounde set seale shoulde deceaue people nomore tyl thousande yeares fulfylled must loced lytell season chapter maye taken wer rehersal vision reuelacions mencioned waie describeth againe honour maiestie christ god worde power holy gospell benefites christ addeth therunto last iudgemet deade whiche shall dye ii deathes angel commeth heauen christ whiche shoulde come worlde promised vnto firste man beginnynge worlde shoulde treade old serpent vpon heade whiche nothing el shoulde take power whiche iust rightuous god hath suffered exercise againste man synne first dysobedience transgression whiche power sathan hath alwayes exercised practised wicked disceyte dyuerse errours specially ydolatrye whiche doe folow blindnes maner synnes power hath christ mightily force taken sathan deuyll thorowe rightuousnes humblenes euen vntyll crosse satisfieng pryde transgression disobedience vnfaithfulnes adam eue thus hath bounde chayne well deserued power say hath hindered proude tyrannye shameful wicked power faithful electe god band indure thousande yeares say long tyme namely euen tyme right christen faith saying olde father indure ii thousande yeares vncerten tyme men begin teken yeares faith tyme sore assaulted whiche hath alwayes bene point euen tyme iewes olde testamet amog god owne people hath sometime increased somtime fallen dedecaied according therunto might satha exercise power tyme tha nother thus thorow christ sathan alwaies bonde vnto right faithfull whan faithe decayeth goeth backewarde falsehede desceite dysobedience man increaseth god word contemned forsaken dothe sathans power increase againe hath ofte come passe maye deceyue people heathen vnfaithfull againe vse power tyranny againe log lacke want true faithe worlde texte p sawe seates sat vpon iudgement geuen vnto sawe soules beheaded witness iesu ye worde god whiche worshipped beast nether ymage neyther taken marke vpon forheades handes lyued raygned christ yere dead men lyued againe vntyll thousande yere finysshed first resurreccio blessed holy hath parte first resurreccion suche shall seconde death haue power shalbe prestes god christ shall raigne thousande yeres seates iudge sathan companye appointed christ vnto holy apostle vnto electe soules whiche lambes sake wer beheaded say diuers maners fasshions put death gospelles sake whiche woulde make oblacions vnto ydols false goddes woulde worship beast saye antichrist woulde feare honour ymage dyd manfully fight holy gospell true doctrine religion apostle shall haue seates kyngdome christ iudge whole companye courte sathan conuince wickednes blasphemy damnable errours whiche shalbe open manifest vnto worlde thorowe gospel condemnacion beyng openly manifestly knowen godles tyrannye shall death whiche shall ryse vp againe tyll thousande yeares past manifest iudgement victory honour obteyned christ vnto first resurreccion namely great honour felicitie onely heaue christ also vpon earth kingdom christ hath vpon earth spirite congregacion holy electe happy blessed lyfe euerlasting heuenly company also holy churche congregacion faithful godly soules vpon earth deare beloued acceptable highest reputacion christ ye lord kynge heauen right prestes minister ought amonge v shall rule reigne christe vnto ende worlde vntyll last daye latter iudgement seconde resurreccion vntil last eternall iudgement wicked damned blasphemer texte p thousande yeares e pi ed satha shalbe losed preson shal go beceaue people whiche foure quarter earth gog magog togather together battayle whose nombre sande see went vp playne earth compassed centes sainctes beloued citie fire came downe god heauen deuoured deuyll deceaued cast lake fyre brimstone beast false prophet shalbe tormented daye night euer lytle tyme last day shall sathan obteyne power againe tyll ende worlde shal exercyse practyse shall worke wt wicked vngodly whole worlde according nature wickednes shall styrte wicked armye warriers gog magog prophetes muche speake greate infinite nomber enemyes god holy doctrine ghospel holy congregation true faythfull christian whiche called dede true ierusalem whiche dwell vpon earth citizen fortunate holy quiet honorable citie comunaltie agaynste holye citie comunaltie shal sathan fyght newe batell armye men warre power myght wyckednes shall attempte goe aboute ouercome deceyue make forsake trueth god shall worke meanes destroye soules thys shall doe whole worlde shall spare laboure compasse aboute besege stony citie ierusalem iewry sayde holye christendome vpon earth cytie faythfull citizins namely godlye elect grace mercie god towarde beloued promesse christ towarde churche greater stronger wickednes power gog magog wycked warrieis agaynst christ shall consume fyre euen stryke senacharibs army vpon hundreth thousande iiii score v thousand one night thorough one aungels brought he fyre goddes vengeaunce ryghtuous iudgement euen vpon shall folowe generall iudgement god whiche deuil hoost copanye shall throwen euerlastyng payne damnation resembled vnto lake graue fyre brymstone whyche dragon beast al false prophetes shalbe tormented day nyght say perpetuallye without ende shall seconde death texte sawe great white seate hym sat whose face fled awaye yearth heauen place nomore founde saw dead bothe great smale stande god bokes opened another boke opened boke lyfe dead iudged thynges whyche writen bokes accordyng dedes sea gaue vp dead death hel deliuered vp dead wer iudged euery according dedes death hell cast lake fire thys seconde death whosoeuer founde writen boke lyfe cast lake fyre great general ryghtuous iust last iudgement god wha whole world shalbe iudged described great whit stoole shall greuous heuy intolerable vnto rebellious disobedyent wycked obstinate contemners god holy worde euerlastynge ghospell christ shall ioyfull swete pleasant delectable welcome acceptable hartely desyred loked vnto godly faythful humble elcte god iudge vpo stoole sauiour iesus christ dreadful feareful vnto al world vnto earthly haue set marke ende loue hope felicitie vpon earth thinges wherin worlde deliteth fleshely lustes pride life al wickednes lack loue toward god neighbour therfore earth sygnifieth men dwel vpo earth deuils remayne earth ayer also called heaue thrust place habitacions found therin place habitacio iust iudgemet omnipotencie god hath prepared ye earth yt wide distant kingdom heauen vnto dredfull terrible iudgement god shal come stand iudgemet seate god christ whiche deade master seruauntes great small hyghe lowe myghtie vnmyghtie men woman yong olde none excepte shal heartes conscience thoughtes secretes al men opened dysclosed onely vnto whiche shal must knowledge selues giltye worthye eternall damnacion also vnto shal wickednes conscience open euydent manifest shall accuse condemne selues without cloke excuse whan shall beholde men shall reade perfyte vnderstandynge feare tremblynge great boke god rightuousnes equite warnynges doctrine instruccions threatnynges whiche haue sufficiently worlde euery one tyme thorowe god mercyfull fatherly prouision sendynge haue vtterly contemned despysed righteousnes godlynes haue taught woulde nothing regarde esteme holy worde god geuen vnto worlde holy scripture perfyte rule square would neuer credyte beleue rashly owne conscience haue refused contemned therfore shall wyped regyster booke faithfull whiche shall lyue perpetually wt god withal peculiar electe eternal ioy blisse thus shal remaine continually eternall indignacion god euerlasting hate enuy painfull tormentes great impacience continuall sorowe muche eternall death shall also corporall payne tormente bodye euen whole felowship deuyll without ende ceasynge iudgement heuy daye shall man able escape auoyde whether consumed earth fyre see standeth hande almightie power god whiche one word wyll commaundement made elementes heauen earth therin sayeth hell shoulde geue vp deade vnderstande therby many place holy scripture graues earthe wheresoeuer whiche deade shall ryse vp shall alyue paule saieth shall changed shorte space twincklynge eye stande together iudgement seate god whiche shall iudged euerlastinge lyfe death euery one whiche shal appeare shall know selues manifestly shal iudge selues accordynge haue done wyll god faith infydelite loue contempt god feare god securitie lustes fleshe rightuously vnrightuouslye shall colour crafte lye dissimulacion violence might anger respecte parson auayle helpe euery man shall iudged accordynge hys workes thus shall hell suche belong vnto shall damned nothing el fyery lake terryble heuy state damnacion ordeyned prepared myserie sorowe wickednes euyll thought ymagyned seconde death rewarde punyshment recompence whiche founde writen boke lyfe shall remayne perpetually christ heauen holy angel electe ioyfull perfyght eternall blisse fruicion grace goodnes prepared god christ heuenly kynge faithfull beleuers incomprehensyble vnto reason wytte sense man onely consyder generallye austen saith saluacion state wherin perfyghtnes aboundantly thinges yt good desyred eyther heauen earth wherunto god mercye helpe bryng v p xxi chapter texte sawe newe heauen newe erth fyrst heauen fyrst erth vanysshed away nomore see iohn saw holy cytie new ierusalem come god heauen prepared bride garnisshed husband harde great voyce heauen saying beholde tabernacle god men wyll dwell shalbe people god himselfe shalbe god nowe place forth holy apostle euangelyst iohn describeth saluation al suche electe state kyngdome heauen finally euerlasting blisse wherof wrote somewhat fyfte chapter wryteth playnely plentuosly largely concernynge newe heauen newe earth maner shall place dyspute contende muche aboute testymony holy apostle peter iohn thys place suffycient v peter thyrde chapter hys seconde epistle sayth iohn doeth thorow worde god wherby heauen earth created made shall newe heauen newe earthe agayne whiche faithfull elect shall well see whyche rather beleue worde god weake deceyueable reason phylosophers whiche haue taken hande dyspute discusse thynges lytle purpose paule dyscusseth matter one worde saying shalbe alwayes ye lord state christ lord euerlastyng kyng namely whiche shall saued angel soules also withal men whiche dyd ryse wente vp heaue christ certen like thorow synne adam thys world corrupte infect earth also weedes vnprofytable thynges whyche hynder hurte pleasaunt good frutes whiche myght serue profitable vnto worlde see lykewyse hir vnquietnes ragyng doth muche harme shall earth water altogether faute lyke mankynde shall lykewyse without maner faute perfyte ioye pleasure blisse euen saye shall whole earth garnyshed suche sort maye paradyse wythout maner labor blessed shall wyshe lyne vpon contrye heauen heauen whiche made wyth one worde may likewise prepared god one worde whole persyte blisse faythfull electe let v content satysfye oure selfes doubte dysputacyon whiche comprehended discussed reason man holy citie iohn sawe nothyng el state faithfull electe eternall full saluation withoute anye maner imperfeccion aboundance goodnes nothing desired sure quiet possessyon heuenly treasure syght fruicion god hyghest onely goodnes felicitie gyue himselfe inioyed louingly comfortably moste blissedly vnto treatures knowlege vnderstandyng thorowe cleare blissed glasse excellent holy excedyng blessed manhode christ kyng honoure blisse vnto faithfull elect whose blessed sacred body soule vnited knytte one holy godhed perfite cleare glasse wherin hys moste pleasaunte gloryfied manhode maye beholden whiche glasse blissed sayntes say saued doe beholde haue perfite fruicion goodnes whiche lorde god selfe benefites gyue vnto creature euerlastyngly glasse sygnified tabernacle god wherein god wyll abyde remayne man grace louing kyndnes newe ierusalem whiche buylded altogether moste precious stone blyssed frendes god god hath pleasure delyght dwell remayne deale distribute ioye felicitie blisse vnto faithfull elect ierusalem myserable wretched citie ye iewes whiche called ierusalem iebus tell howe manye name besyde whiche ofte ouerthrowen rebellyon disobedience citizen forsoke god whyche cytie blynde proude frowarde obstynace iewys doe fyxe set hope felicitie hope desyre lordes reigne ouer al men messias vaynely beyng grossely deceyued doe looke gape ierusalem whiche neyther heauenlye earthly spirituall ierusalem generall felowshyp brotherhoode faythfull seruautes god whiche haue ryghte christen fayth perfyte loue thorowly furnyshed good holy workes bondes lymites whereof thorout whole compase earth wheresoeuer lorde god rightly knowen truely serued owne wyll expressed worde iii maner ierusalems saynct iohn speaketh place heauenly newe cytie blissed god whiche citie heauen prepared god made readye christ brydegrome faythfull spouse whiche spouse garnished selfe god heauenly grace vertues ornamentes perfeccion citie heauenly eternall ierusalem shall lorde god christ dwell among people deare beloued spowse well garnyshed floryshyng bryde moste hyghe ioye delyght endles blisse felycitie texte god shall wipe awaye teares eye shalbe nomore death nether sorowe nether criyng nether shall bee payne olde thinges gone sat vpon seate sayed beholde make al thinges newe sayed vnto write wordes faythfull true sayed vnto doen alpha omega beginninge ende wyll geue hym thirst well water lyfe free ouercommeth shal inherite thinges wylbe god shalbe sonne howe blisse shall man expresse thynges shall doeth declare first shall teares shall maner aduersitie trouble vexacion happen vnto man also maner decaye weakenes neither body soule maner sycknes infirmitie complexion bodyly hurte affliccion dreade feare death heuy greuous temptacio lacke thing myschanuce weeping waylyng payne smart impediment state blisse saluacion thought sorowe taken thinges first originall occasion misery synne adam eue whose sake worlde created altogether past vtterly ceased ended finyshed together death deuyll thorowe rightuousnes sauiour christ thorowe whiche rightuousnes mankynde many faithful reconciled vnto god euermore thus hath christ syttyng vpon stoole kyngdom glorye ordeyned thinges newe must stedfastlye confessed beleued faithfull christian infallyble trueth therfore god commaundement shoulde wrytten euerlasting remembraunce holsome doctrine consolacion men beleue trueth beleuynge obteyne blisse saluacion ende thinges blisse saluacion mankynde god whiche wyll declare dystribute glorye mercye louynge kyndnes vnto whiche hath chosen euerlasting vnto honour glorye whiche begynnynge ende thinges euer euer shal vnto vale mysery dyd thirst rightuousnes glory god vnto wyll grace fauorable mercye god gyue liuing wel fountayne goodnes eternal springynge floode refreshment vnto saluacion perpetuall ioy felicitie god giftes rewardes must obteyned muche labour trauell yet properly desert merite suche great euerlastynge rewarde hyghest goodnes felicitie purchased labour trauell man must obteyned enherited free grace mercye god vnto whiche shall thus eternally blessed shall christ spouse bryde grome churche iesus sauiour also god theyr perfyte satisfaccion suche maner wyse shall deare child louyng sonnes christ shall father brother god euerlastinge kyng captayne texte p fearfull vnbeleuynge abhominable murdrers whormongers sorcerer ydolatres lyars shal haue parte lake whiche burneth fyre brimstone whiche seconde death foloweth also contrary part christ iudge shall ordeine make whiche worlde fearfull cruell vnto godly humble lowly men hiche haue hurte noyed men whiche neuer woulde credite beleue holy gospell holy scripture euerlastinge worde god whiche haue handled dealte abhominably al kynde nature al loue whiche euen natural kynd set purpose haue bene murtherers shedder innocent bloude whiche haue defyled stayned naturall state ordeyned god fylthy vnchastnes haue practised sorcery witchcrafte contrarye honour lawe god without makinge bande couenanut wicked spirite arche nemny god whome haue serued obeyed pleasure commaundement setting vp chapel altares seruing honouring worshippinge praying vnto callynge vpon false goddes vnder name sainctes whome haue sought farre nere make oblacions vnto holy prophetes haue alwaies cried false teacher false prophetes false apostle lyars wicked doer part shall eternall damnacio nothing sorowe angwishe weping waylyng heuines dystresse delpaite euerlasting contempt hatred god whiche seconde death vnto whiche men doe come thorowe forenamed synnes blasphemy co mitted world without repentance amendmet first death corporall death bodye layed vpon men almightye god reason synne texte p came vnto one seuen angel whiche seuen vyalles ful seuen laste plage talked sayinge come hither wyll shewe hee bryde lambes wyfe caried awaie spirite great hye mountaine shewed great citie holy ierusalem descending heauen god hauinge brightnes god shynyng like vnto stone precious euen lyke iasper clere christ walles great hye twelue gate gate twelue angel name wrytten whiche name twelue tribe israel east parte thre gate northsyde thre gate towardes southe thre gate west thre gate wall citie twelue foundacions twelue name lambes xii apostle christ angell great councell whiche thorowe angel serue worketh bringeth passe ordinance god punyshmentes plage wicked vnfaithfull whiche doe hynder let ordinance rewarde dothe pay selfe selfe rewarde crowne blessed christ lorde sauiour talketh iohn beloued speciall trust loue towardes sheweth spouse wyfe nameth lambes wyfe christen churche felowship saintes holy electe christen churche ii maner state first state mylitant euer striuynge fightyng euer warrefare assaulted much trouble vexacion sorowfull vnperfyte euer waxyng increasynge state triumphant victorious euer triumphinge quiet free without care sorowe vexacion perfyte heauenly blessed euerlasting bothe state certen fewe property earthly ierusalem citie iewes set figure comparison example counterpane whiche ierusalem iewes lyeth vpon hyll hath xii gate great hyghe walles lyeth highe towarde whole lande rounde euery behalfe whiche wyll knowe maye reade iosephus writeth largely therof nowe speaketh christ spirituall ierusalem double state lyeth also highe muche highly indewed wt god grace glorious giftes whose sake almightie god sent onely begotten sunne vpon earth clense make pure bylde bewtifie garnyshe make glorious euen euerlastynge kingdome deare beloued spouse selfe citie great reacheth vnto endes coastes worlde also holy sanctified holy blessed presence christ wt precious hearte bloode shedde highest loue obedience towarde god mankynde washeth waye synnes worlde al faythful purged clensed descending heuenly citie ierusalem holy chrysten churche sygnifieth comon felowshyp participacion churche riumphant reygnyth victory churche mylytant contyneweth remaineth battel warrefare bothe one churche deuided sondred ii onely worlde reason tyme churche whiche nowe militant lyeth warrefare vpon earthe shal shortly heaue victorious triumphant churche vpon earthe heauen hathe one godly glorye al honour vertue prayse might blisse commeth vnto god light churche precious stone namely vpon earth faythe loue heauen trueth saluacio christ walles defende preserue kepe citie faith belefe holy worde god whiche faithfull beleuers kept preserued xii gate maye take vnderstande xii article holye christen faythe vpon gate xii apostle patriarkes prophetes whiche haue glorious holy name onely written heauen aboue holy saintes also vpo earth militant warrefaring chutch gate article wel orderly set appointed father sunne holy gost grace rewarde redempcion xii foundacions walles maye taken bokes olde newe testament vpon whiche ye wall christen churche holy faithe whiche one bothe christianes olde newe testament bothe prophetes apostle ought founded grounded apostle named prophetes done purpose much thorow apostle doctrine prophetes gospell promysed prophetes spredde abrode publyshed whose wyde worlde whiche gospell prophetes dyd preache wryte onely vnto child israel neighbour people nexte lande israell againe apostle witness owne parson slaying death lambe texte p talked golden rede measure citie gate therof wal therof citie buylt foure square length large bredth measured citie rede twelue furlonges length bredth heyght equall measured wall therof cxliiii c byte measure angell measure man vseth buildyng wal iasper citie pure golde lyke vnto cleare glasse foundacions wall citie garnished maner precious stone first foundacion iaspis seconde saphire thirde calcedony fourthe emeralde fyfte sardoni syrie sardoes seuenth crysolite eight beral nynth topas tenth chrisoprasos eleeuenth iaciute twelue chist xliiii ezechiell lykewyse zacharie doe reade mystery holy citie whiche described thoughe shoulde measured long brode howe highe done christ maner vision misterie christ knoweth churche well inoughe whiche rin belong therunto golden reed golden met wonde signifieth right square holy scripture whiche onely declareth sheweth certenly truly ryghte croked wel amisse religion doctrine ceremony dyscipline churche citie lyeth foure square sygnifieth iiii quarter worlde whiche almightie god hath alwayes peculier electe faithful folowers obseruers true loue god neighbour wherin consisteth lawe prophetes also commaundement christ sauiour whole worlde length east west bredth northe south higth euen earth heauen heauen earth whole churche triumphant heauen militant vpon earth full glory god power kyngdome christ whiche father gaue whan dyd set right hande moost hyghe honour glorye blisse mirrour vnto faithfull holy electe hundreth xliiii full perfite nomber euen xii tymes xii signifieth perfeccion grace god holy goost true perfite vertues whiche true faithe onely preserueth maketh good perfight also acceptable vnto god true faithe belefe hath alwaies bene preached preserued holy churche well israelite christianes standeth marked thorowe holy goost holy scripture many precious stone theri holy doctrine example state christendom christen religion churche god holy ierusalem buylded thys ie buy ded pure golde fayth feruent loue whych compared vnto golde also without putenes innocent godly lyfe whych sygnified glasse nowe comparison xii precious stone wyth xii article fayth many thynges myght wrytten sayd leaue vnto learned consyder muche effecte nothyng watyng holy goost hath set forth opened vnderstandyng place holy scripture playnely texte twelue gate wer twelue pearles euery gate one pearle strete citie pure golde thorow shynyng glasse sawe temple therin lorde god almyghty lambe temple citie hath nede sonne nether mone lyghten bryghtnes god dyd lyght lambe lyght people saued shall walke lyght kinges ear shall brynge glorye honour vnto gate shut ay shalbe nyght shal brynge glory honour nacions shall enter none vnclene thyng nether whatso uer worketh abhominacio maketh lye onely writte lambes booke ly e hereby e well perceyued thys vision buyldyng thys cy ie muste ought vnderstande spiritually maner custome prophetes founde perles great agayne men make walles gate wyth perles specially speaketh one perle stretes nothyng sene pure golde loue purenesse cl anesse lyfe hathe none may dwell christen may admitted b ci izen heuenly felowship temple ierusalem bodilye exteriour temple aultar p esthode iewes lyke tabernacle moyses permitted also vnto iewes long dwelt land el corporall exteriour god seruice haue bene done much citie faithfull golden ierusalem reacheth vnto people nacions landes almightie god wil iewishe sacrifice wyll muche rather honoured worshipped spirite trueth requireth faithfull sacrifice thanckes geuynge saluacion whiche god hath prepared v thorowe christ whiche priest aultar sacrifice altogether therfore christen congregacion nede suche temple stone woode golde faithful louyng thanckeful harte mynde good right temple vnto lord onely ye lord god tempell wherunto shoulde turne ofte wyll praye geue thanckes vnto god onely heare v helpe v saue v goodnes commeth onely therfore al honour prayse thanckes geuynge perteyneth vnto onely god doth vnto v onely thorow ye innocent labe whiche onely washeth awaye synnes worlde offered vp v rightuousnes innocencye hath made full satisfaccion synnes electe lambe sunne rightuousnes without maner blemyshe whiche man see moone whiche somtyme waxeth sometyme minisheth therfore christen churche heauenly ierusalem hath lyght inoughe sufficient christ whiche light worlde saieth also brightnes god farre pleased god father shoulde knowe thorowe christ cause sacke lyght trueth grace helpe wh le churche yf churche beneth militant warrefaring churche darknes reason worde god kept downe reason christ taken none right churche notwithstande christe shineth bryght burneth also heartes faithfull lyght christ doe people walke whiche shall saued holy christen faithe preached holy man iohns tyme grew increased al landes nacions whole earth kinges also heathen called receyued christ indewed highe benefites great grace long reteine kepe gospel doctrine bible mainteyned constantly true faith god holy worde long gate christen article doe stande open long dothe light daye ye christen religion doctrine wysedome continew long faithe remayneth faileth long shal errour hurte christen churche yet obscure darken faithe whiche article preached apostle al nacions euen heathen easely brought allured manifest gospel proued euidently worde god sone men woulde goe beyonde rule square haue gone set vp new article faith councels without besyde worde god bothe vnnecessary reason coulde true faithe increase tyme tyme multitude new article dyd increase euen dyd true faithe diminishe decaye became christendome doe see ye p tie lesse lesse burthen ceremony tyll waxed intollerable article auricul r eare confession purgatorye supersticious fastinge ye primac bysshoppe rome eleuacion adoracion sacramente body bloude christ inuocacion saintes worshippynge ymages lyke haue brought great offence slander vnto christen churche haue bene great occasion ruyne fall many vnfaithfull holy churche shal vncleane thing enter true faithe loue shal preuent auoyde al maner euyl bloude lamble shall pourge clense washe awaye maner ynnes lyke maner also abhominacion vnto lorde ydolatry abhominable blasphemy forged lye false doctrine shall haue place ye right churche vnto right holy churche knowe onely vnto god inuisible vpon earthe doe onely electe child god perteyne whose name wrytten heauen booke lyuynge p xxii chapter texte p shewed pure ryuer water lyfe clere christ procedyng seate god lambe myddes strete e yde ryuer ther wood lyfe bare twelue maner frutes gaue frute euery moneth eues wood serued heale people al ther shalbe cu se seate god lambe shalbe seruauntes shall serue shal se face name shalbe forheades ther shalbe night nede candle nether lyght sunne lorde geueth lighte shall raygne euermore christ openeth vnto iohn deare beloued disciple secrete misteries kingdom heaue expoundeth vision prophetes farre furth requisite necessary christen doctrine thus iohn seeth pure ryuer water clere whiche holy scripture ye worde god doctrine christ holy gospel saluacio clere vnto al haue pure heart mynde defyled blemished transitorye loue care worlde temptacions ye flesshe holy doctrine procedeth commeth fro holy spirite god christ one god father sonne seate glorye omnipotencie ye godheade procedeth welspring wysedom grace mercye floweth throughe myddes al streates christes churche citie god lambe side riuer doe stade glorious bewtiful tree lyfe receyue increase leaues frute moysture riuer tree ye holy father faithful christen churche olde new testament whiche faith vnderstandynge readyng holy scripture ye lawe ye prophetes gospell haue lyued taught wrought frutefully holy citie churche haue brought forthe twelue maner frutes saye many frutes haue serued god without ceasynge muche frute profyte right true good wo kes vertuous exercise leaues frute sappe holy tree holsome soueraine also frutes dysciples prophetes apostle holy bysshops preacher god worde dyd make repentance faithfull holy christen people preachinge eachinge wrytinge prayer christen example lyfe whiche hethen churche cursed frute meate vncleane vnto faithfull shall receyue inioy maner frutes meates thanckes geuynge temperatenes measure neyther shall holy goost extingwysshed holy churche god shall prouyde minister god shall incorage comforte ayde assystence shall profyte goe forwarde procede frutefully goodnes thorowe true faithe shall knowe face god gracious mercifull wyll pleasure militant warrfarynge churche heauenly ierusalem shall knowe face face euen shall laude prayse euerlastingly minister seruantes god shall ashamed knowledge confesse ye name god christen faith holy gospel shal beare preache glorifie name christ openly ioy delyght pleasure neyther sunne moone shal helpe adde thing cleare bright daye god knowledge spirite god shall doe together blissed soules heauen haue sunne moone glasse godheade excellent bewty glorified exalted manhode christe wherby shall reygne blisse euermore texte p sayde vnto sayinges faithful true lorde god saintes prophetes sent angell shewe vnto seruauntes thinges whiche must shortly fulfylled beholde come shortly happy kepeth sayinge prophecy boke iohn whiche saw thinges hearde whe hearde sene fell downe worship fete angel shewed thinges said vnto thou thy felow seruaunt felowe seruaunt hy brother prophetes kepe saynges booke worshippe god christ speaketh vnto iohn geueth witnesse testimonye vnto booke reuelacion secrete misteries al whiche written booke certen true contemned taken trifle fable booke ordeyned god spoken thorow angell vnto iohn write leaue behynde faithfull holy churche christ euen god whiche reueled vnto holy prophetes men god thinges come ye god hath sent angel geuen commission open reuele vnto iohn vision prophecy thinges come whiche happen come passe fulfilled shortly say shortly begin happen come passe one another vntil fulfylled beholde certen thinges wil come shortly comming christ prophecied vnto v suche sorte forme carfully diligently wayte continuallye lyke true faithful seruantes doe waite watche vpo returning theyr master doe neuer slepe christ teacheth gospel boke shoulde contemned lyghtly estemed christen churche therfore christ sayethe messenger angell happye saye seruaunte god pleaseth lorde well shall partaker grace saluacion whiche beleueth booke taketh thinges written therin true holy estemeth prophecy boke whiche many diuerse lesse holy bookes prophetes euangelistes holy prophecy saieth iohn muche say thus yf ye beleue preaching christ matter iohn whiche conuersaunte lyued christ
