beleue booke also vision syghtes sayinges haue seene hearde selfe haue written booke knowe also assured angell holy angell therfore feare reuerence woulde haue worshipped seruaunt minister god dyd also worship fell downe feete worship might seme shewe thankefulnes vnto infinite benefite grace reueled opened vnto suche highe holy secrete misteries woulde accept receyue suche honour worship handes content therwith wherby taught vtterly honour worship none onely almighty god althoughe nature dignitie angel higher state dignite man yet reason manhode christ reason saluacion mankynde thorowe christ nature man exalted aboue angel therfore hence forthe angell wyll hygher estemed felowe seruaunt men vnto lorde lykewyse sauiour christ nameth himselfe felow brother disciple also resurreccion also angel nameth iohn place brother felow apostle onely booke sheweth acceptable vnto lorde namely reputed euen brother christe whiche doe esteme booke beleue wordes whiche written therin therfore man ought esteme booke lightly contemne much many place teacheth misteries christ euidentlye althoughe dyuerse thinges prophecied booke whiche haue yet beue sene fulfylled concerne tyme latter tyme somewhat darke obscure texte p sayde vnto seale sayinges prophecye boke tyme hande doeth euyll let euil styll whiche fylthye let fylthye styl righteous let righteous holy let holy beholde come shortly rewarde geue euery man according dedes shadie alpha omega begynnyng ende first last blessed doe commaundementes theyr power maye tree lyfe maye entre thorowe gate citie without shalbe dogges inchaunters whoremonger murcherers ydolaters whosoeuer loueth maketh leasynges olde testamente commynge christe prophetes partly commaunded seale prophecyes lyke fulfyllynge suche thynges prophecyed promised fatte euen myght many dyuers opynyons amonge interpreter place angell commaundeth iohn seale boke muche suche matter prophecied therin shoulde fulfylled shortly euydent dyuerse fulfylled immediately yea euen great notable vision subuersion destruccion citie ierusalem death banyshment iewes alreadye fulfylled whiche cause dyd prophecy nothing dyuerse thinges yet come dyd prophecye therfore also booke wrote holy gospel godheade iesus christ certen heretikes therfore saieth tyme hande whiche cause men must suffer wicked worke accordynge vnto wickednes shall practyse long men must suffer wicked iewes hethen whiche wylfullye maliciouslye doe noye persecute faithfull christian take theyr pleasure let false apostle heretikes hipocrites whiche pretende great holynes althoughe shamefully defyled well inwardly wardlye let remayne defyled wicked shall shortely haue ende iudgement god hangeth ouer heades doeth well rightlye nedeth feare iudgement comming christ holy thorowe true faithe loue towarde christ desiereth ernestly day daye commynge christ vnto last generall iudgement sone seeth token happen haue lykelyhode approchinge end worlde whiche shoulde come passe lyfteth vp heade sygheth wysheth commynge christ desierously might sone rid delyuered myserp wretchednes worlde thou iohn marke take good hede wyll come shortly bringe rewarde al haue laboured done eyther good euyll tyrannes worker iniquite wyll punyshe dystresse plage blasphemer lykewyse begynnynge thinges haue created worlde worde whiche god hath created thinges also end last daye shall daye whan shall come iudge quicke deade performe doe god commaundementes true faith loue indeuour themselues al diligence doe wil pleasure god wt holy workes vertuous exercise whansoeuer haue trouble ouersite call praye vnto god grace mercye christes sake whose rightuousnes take oblacion ransome synnes offerynge vp vnto sacrifice thankesgeuynge true perfyte faythe mercye god thorowe christ iesus suche true faithfull men lyke vnto frutefull tree begynneth budde whiche due tyme bryngeth furthe muche fruite suche true faithfull beleuers onely enter thorowe faythe christen churche vpon earthe whan tyme commeth shall also enter heauenly churche vnfaithfull doe shewe declare also theyr frutes wyckednes fleshely lustes wherin defyle selues euen lyke swyne become shameles theyr synnes lyke dogges whiche cause enter righte christen churche congregation neyther sorcerer inchanters whoremonger murtherers worshipper ydols suche make lye malyce euyll conscience texte p iesus sent myne angell testifie vnto thinges congregacions rote generacion dauid bright mornynge star e spirit bryde say come let heareth say also come let thirste come let whosoeuer wyll take water lyfe free lyke almightie god saieth vnto moyses god thy father c euen saieth angell person christe inspiracion christes spirite prophecy opened reueled euen christ selfe thorowe angell vnto holy iohn therfore men ought credyte beleue sightes vision reuelacions ought also propouned preached vnto congregacions edifienge faithfull maye take diligent hede beware terryble shameful perels daungers euyls shal preuayle christen church shortly aryse beginne alredy happened shall daylye fulfylled one nother sayd howe christ oole dauid marke wel much sake dauids kingdom preserued posterite also preserued extreme troblesome affliccions iewishe nacion vntyll suche tyme christ lorde sautout borne stocke progeny dauid withstandynge synnes wherwith dauid dyspleased god dyd maner greater heynous synnes saule dyd yet coulde vse helpe nother thing fauynge onely faith promes god whiche assured promised christ lorde promised mess borne seede wherin might well reioyse bothe selfe also al posteritie kynges lordes therfore lord sauiour christ e generacion dauid reason manhode concernyng godheade hath vnknowen rysinge vp begynnynge vnknowen commynge furthe euerlastinge birthe lykewyse christ accordynge manhode bryght mornynge starre whiche drawe allure eye al men vnto vnto risyng vp vnto blisse vnto saluacion voyce christ brydegrome foloweth voyce desyre bryde spouse whiche true faithe heartye desyre zeale faithfull electe desireth wyssheth seconde comminge christ vnto latter iudgement consequently inioy participacion blessed perfyte kyngdome heauen faithfull electe bothe bodye soule electe child god doe hunger thirst honour glorye christ kingdome heauen well vpon earthe already heauen wyshe desyre spirite fulfyllyng god wyll pleasure wherunto humblenes submission doe vtterly submitte wyll knowe wyll best moost perfyte desire wyshe faithfull electe pleaseth god well althoughe wyl heate suche tyme desyre euen moment yet dothe promyse vnto gracious ayde mercye meane tyme whiche wyll doutles performe mere grace mercye without maner deserte texte p testifye vnto euery man heareth wordes prophecye booke yf man shall adde vnto thinges god shal adde vnto plage written booke yf man shall minishe workes prophecye god shal take awaye patre dooke lyfe holy e thinges whiche written boke whiche testifieth thinges saithe come qu ly amen euen come lorde iesu grace lord iesu christe amen place first speakynge christ againe speakynge holy bryde christen churche maye holy apostle iohn speake wordes owne parson dyd begynnynge booke warne exhorte al men man adde thing vnto booke new vision booke holy scripture take thing thoughe thing might mysunderstande therin refused vnholy good god wyll suffer suche thing vnpunysshed vnaduenged intent meanyng wordes therfore men doe amysse synne greatly whiche doe refuse whole booke thoughe autentical euident hath bene alwayes songe reade holy churche begynnynge ende bookes called apocripha vnautenticall whiche men might well reade churche priuately selues churche congregacion lawfull confirme mainteyne maner doctrine concerninge faithe relygion auctoritie suche vnautenticall bookes except pointes conformable vnto holy scripture foloweth sayeth testifieth thinges saieth c wordes maye referred vnto goeth christ speaketh callynge bryde euen christe sayeth last ende againe yea come without doubte take thought thincke long tyme long vnto whiche amen saye without doubt dothe holy iohn conclude ende booke maner apostle desiring e nestly commynge kyngdome christ quickely faithfull christian doe grace lorde iesus christ faithfull electe christian whiche shall vntyll ende worlde specially whiche reade booke faithe holy christen desyre mynde amen p ende reuelacion iohn thus brefely expounded seruaunt christ leo iude minister churche tigury translated high duche edmonde alen
